Viven en la casa de  su tío ellos tiene su lotecito pero les falta todavía terminar de construir,   precisamente el destino del crédito es para  la compra de material de construcción para terminar la construcción de un cuarto en su domicilio y así brindar comodidad a su familia,  el se encuentra en su  secta secuencia siempre a cancelado puntual,  por tal motivo se siente feliz y  muy  agradecido por el apoyo económico brindado por la institución ya que es bastante eficaz, ágil,  y ligero no le ponen trabas como en otros lugares. El es un cliente fiel  ha nosotros ya que solo trabaja con emprender.
texts.en:
Sr. Adrián was born in Santa Cruz, but lives in the town of Santa Rita – El Torno. He has worked as a bricklayer for more than a year. His wife is Sra. Gabriela and they have a daughter. They live at his uncle’s house. Adrián and his family have a small lot, but the construction of their home is still not finished.

The exact use of this loan will be used to buy building materials in order to finish the construction of a room in his home. This will provide comfort for his family. He has always demonstrated punctuality with his loans. Adrián is happy and appreciative of the financial support provided by the organization, which has demonstrated more efficiency, flexibility, and speed than other institutions. He is a loyal client and has only worked with Emprender.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for finishing a room.

loans.name: Sulejka

texts.es: Sulejka, de 41 años, es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y muy dinámica. Convive con Justo de 47 años con quien tiene tres hijos, Iván de 14, Ximena de 10 y la menor, Saori de 6 meses. Juntos habitan en su propia casa y todos los días trabaja para ofrecer una mejorar calidad de vida a sus hijos. Sulejka tiene muy buenos gustos con la prendas de vestir, desde muy niña le encantaba confeccionar prendas a sus muñecas y vestir a sus hermanos menores. Con el tiempo se fue dando cuenta que lo suyo era la costura, así que decidió a instalar un taller en su casa en donde espera a sus clientes para poder hacerles nuevos modelos, diseños especiales y remendar algunas prendas. Trabaja por más de 5 años en este rubro, y manifiesta que cuando empezó trabajaba para otras personas y tenía muchas dificultades, pues sus ingrersos eran minimos, lo cual no lo ayudaba a pagar sus gastos en el hogar. Con el tiempo decidió que era momento de empezar algo propio y fue ahí que inicio su trabajo independiente, ahora le esta yendo mucho mejor ya que tiene buenos ingresos y desea seguir haciendo crecer su negocio. Este será el crédito número 5 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar, por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual así como lo hizo en sus créditos anteriores, está muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son muy amables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales y algunas herramientas que le hacen falta, como tijeras especiales y telas para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Sulejka, who is 41 years old, is a hard working woman, enterprising and very dynamic. She lives with Justo, who is 47 years old, with whom she has three children: Iván who is 14 years old, Ximena who is 10 years old and 6 month old Saori, she is the youngest. Together they live in their own home and everyday she works to offer a better quality of life to their children. Sulejka has very good tastes when it comes to clothing. Since she was little, she has liked to make doll dresses and dress her younger siblings. Over time, she realized that sewing was her passion and she decided to install a workshop in her house where she could attend to her customers, make new designs and mend clothing. She has been working in this industry for 5 years and expresses that when she started, she worked for other people and had many difficulties. Her income was minimal and did not help to pay the household expenses. Over time, she decided that it was the right moment to start her own business and she started to work independently. Now, everything is going much better for her now that she has better income and she wishes to continue growing her business. 

This will be her fifth loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she will have financial support, because in this way she will feel more secure in growing her business. On the other hand, she commits once more to fulfill her loan payments on time as she did with her previous loans. She is very happy to belong to a communal bank. All of the members are very nice and support each other. With the loan, she will buy materials and tools that she doesn't have, such as scissors and fabrics to continue her business.

loans.use: purchase fabric, scissors and other sewing materials.

loans.name: Almostagbal /abeer Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-mostgbal /Abeer and consists of four members who are all female: Ghalia, Noura, Safiah and Mahbah. All of them are friends  from Aden, Yemen. They primarily work together in small businesses like sewing. The group took a loan of 200,000 YER.

Mahbah is the leader of their group. (She is the second lady standing on the left covered by a purple, green and white Islamic veil outfit.) She is 40 years old, widowed with eight children and lives in Aden.
\
Her main business is sewing, which is used to stitch patterns of fabric. She has been in business for several years and she employed two women to help her in her business. With several years of experience to her credit, she now has a good command of her activity. She is taking a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB and intends to use her loan to better develop her business to purchase fabrics and textiles to increase her savings. Her profits will allow her to help her family’s needs.

In the future, Mahbah would like to have a big center to sell other products such as incense, perfumes and different clothes.

loans.use: to purchase products like fabrics and textiles for their business.

loans.name: Mawou

texts.en: Mawou is 20 years old and lives in Jacob Town. She is married and has a three-year- old child.  For the past three years, she has been selling roasted meat and fish in the community. She makes more profit and has more customers since she is the only one who sells roasted meat and fish in her community. She is requesting a loan to purchase more meat and fish for her business and her plan is to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more meat and fish for her business

loans.name: Lesli Zulema

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al trabajo de farmacia,ella trabaja en la ciudad de Cusco desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es terminar de construir su casa,hacer el techado de su casa.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construccion como cemento,yeso y tejas para el techado de su casa.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues in her job at a pharmacy. She works in the city of Cusco from 8am to 5pm. Through her job, she is able to move forward. Her dream is to finish the construction of her house, which includes installing a roof.

The member is requesting a loan to buy construction materials, such as cement, plaster, and tiles for the roof of her house. She is happy with the loan and promises to complete the payments.

loans.use: to buy cement, plaster, and tiles for installing a roof.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet 35-year-old Kadiatu from Waterloo eastern area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. She is married with two children between the ages of 10 and 18 years old. Kadiatu's children are currently attending school. In 1997, Kadiatu established her business. She began her business because timber has no seasonal problem and it is easy to operate. She works at the business from 7:30 am until 8:00 pm, 7 days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are fuel problems in processing the timber and transporting it from one point to another.

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to buy more timber and saw machines. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children. In the future, she plans to employ people to make different types of furniture. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more timber and saw machines.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en:
This is 30-year-old Mariama from Waterloo eastern area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. She is married with three children between the ages of 2 and 22 years old.

Mariama established her business because she wants to improve the community health centre. Mariama runs a pharmacy at her store. She sells oral rehydration salt (ORS), glucose, blood syrup, cool syrup, and malaria drugs. She has been running this business for 10 years. She works at the business from 7 am until 9 pm, 7 days per week. Her business is the main source of income she has. She says that the main challenge to her business is drugs that expire before they are sold.

Mariama has requested a loan in order to buy more medicines such as oral rehydration salt (ORS), glucose, malarial drugs, blood syrup and cool syrup. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children. In the future, she plans to build a medical store and train people within the same community. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: To purchase more medicines such as oral rehydration salt, glucose and malaria drugs.

loans.name: Ana Dilia

texts.es:
Ana, vive con sus tres hijos y su esposo, ella trabaja en casas, realizando labores del hogar, pero tambien con su esposo cultivan maíz, apoyándose ya que las cosechas son beneficios para el hogar,
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de arena, cemento, piedra, para reparar las paredes de la vivienda, con estos materiales, estará en mejores condiciones el hogar, siendo más seguros para habitar.
El objetivo de Ana es trabajar honradamente, cultivar la tierra, y ver siempre la manera de seguir adelante, para mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her three children and her husband.  She works in houses doing household chores.  She and her husband also grow maize, which they rely on because the harvests are profitable for their household.

Ana is asking for a loan to purchase sand, cement, and stone for repairing the walls of her house.  With these materials she will be able to improve the condition of her home, which will then be safer to live in.  

Ana’s aim is to work honorably, to cultivate her land, and to always see the way to get ahead so she can improve her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and stone for repairing her home.

loans.name: Osman

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 41-year-old Osman from Waterloo eastern area in Freetown. He is married with two children between the ages of 4 and 8 years old. Osman's children attend school. 

Osman runs a fashion jewelry store at Waterloo. He sells eyelashes, fashion earrings, eyeliner and nail tips. He has been running this business for three years. He began his business because it easy to handle in terms of transportation, jewelry is more attractive to women and sales run faster. He works at the business from 7:30 am until 7 pm, 7 days per week. His business is the main source of income he has.  Osman says that the main challenge to his business is price inflation.

Osman has requested a loan in order to purchase more jewelry. The extra income from this loan will allow him to educate his children. In the future, he plans to improve by building more shops. He thanks you for your support!

loans.use: To purchase more fashion jewelry.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.es:
Adelina, vive en familia, con su hijo y la esposa de él, todos trabajan en la casa, ella administra una pupuseria, la inicio por ideas propias, ya que quería tener una ocupación en su propia casa, trabaja tres días a la semana, solamente por las tardes, desde hace 15 años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una plancha para hacer las pupusas, tambien material como quesillo, chicharrón, maíz, aceite, con este préstamo lograra obtener una nueva herramienta para la elaboración de las pupusas, permitiéndole mejorar y seguir atendiendo bien a los clientes.
El objetivo de Adelina es realizar una buena inversión con el préstamo, para atender a la clientela, además que esto estabilizara el negocio y los ingresos para sus propias necesidades.
texts.en:
Adelina lives in a home with her son his wife. They all work from the home. She runs a Pupuseria [stuffed meat and cheese breads] stand from the home, which was her idea to start as she wanted a home based business.  She works three days a week, only in the afternoons or evenings, for the past 15 years.

She is requesting a loan to buy a flat iron to make the pupusas, as well as the cheese, pork, corn and oil ingredients. This loan she will obtain the new tool to make the pupusas which will allow her to improve her business and get more customers.  

Adelina aims to make a good investment in her business with the loan in order to better serve her customers.  This would further establish her business and she could put the income put towards her needs.

loans.use: to buy a flat iron to make the pupusas, as well as the cheese, pork, corn and oil.

loans.name: Abu

texts.en:
Abu is 50 years old and married with two children, 7 years old and 17 years old. He runs a local foodstuff store in the Waterloo eastern area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. He began this business because it runs faster.

He's been in this business for 20 years and sells gari (fermented cassava), palm oil, beans and pepper at his store. His business is the main source of income he has. He says that the main challenge to his business is transporting goods from one village to another.

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more local foodstuff items such as gari, palm oil, beans and pepper. He says that the extra income from this loan will help him to educate his children. In the future, he would like to supply other customers of the same business. He is grateful for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more local foodstuff such as gari (fermented cassava), palm oil, beans and pepper.

loans.name: Khenmedekh

texts.en:
Mrs. Khenmedekh, 35, sells casual clothes in the bazaar. She has been selling them for two years, and before that, she used to sell cement in the construction materials market. 

She lives with her husband and two children in the slum district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. During the winter, her sales volume always rises, and she needs to increase her commodities/working capital. Actually, winter coats are very salable goods, and she can sell them at a quite higher price. Now, she needs some money to purchase the winter coats and clothes in large numbers from her supplier to increase the working capital.

loans.use: To purchase winter coats and clothes in large numbers from her supplier to increase the working capital.

loans.name: Nyamdorj

texts.en:
Mr. Nyamdorj, 36, runs freight transportation around Mongolia. Actually, he carries the construction materials or heavy mining goods between the places in the countryside by his truck. He started his business one and a half years ago. Before, he used to work as a manual laborer in Korea and came to his motherland just before he started his business. 

He lives with his family in the slum district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city. Currently, his business income is a main income source for this family. Now, Nyamdorj wants to make routine maintenance and adjustments to his truck. It is a quite expensive in Mongolia, but it's a beneficial thing to improve and to take much more orders in the future. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the necessary spare parts for his truck and cover the cost of auto service. He believes that he is going to have a transportation bureau after a decade.

loans.use: To purchase some necessary spare parts for his truck and cover the cost of auto service.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia, de 42 años, es una mujer humilde y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Leandro de 46 años y sus 05 queridos hijos a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Antonia, es una señora de provecho se consagra con mucho esmero a remover la tierra para luego cultivar plantas de cacao, actividad que elabora hace mas de 27 años. En tiempos de cosecha; Antonia junto a su esposo, hijos y la ayuda de jornaleros puede extraer rápidamente los frutos para luego venderlas a los centros de acopio ubicadas en su localidad. De la misma forma le resulta difícil poder efectuar el trabajo en la chacra  ya que se siente cansada por los esfuerzos que efectúa.  Por tanto acude a los financistas de MFP, para solicitar un préstamo y poder abrir una pequeña tienda de abarrotes donde pueda atender tranquilamente a la gente de su localidad. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP, siente mucha alegría de saber que contará con el apoyo de los financieros ya que de esa manera puede seguir con su objetivo de trabajo, como también se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas de pago para que pueda acceder a otro crédito mas adelante. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará sacos de arroz, azúcar, conservas, fideos, entre otros para incursionar en la instalación de una tienda.
texts.en: Antonia is 42 years old and is a humble and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her husband, Leandro who is 46 years old, and their 5 loving children to whom she wishes to give a better quality of life. Antonia is a woman who works very hard as she tills the land to later plant her cocoa crops, work that she has done for over 27 years. During the harvest season, Antonia along with her husband, children and day laborers’ remove the fruits quickly and sell them to markets in the area. It is difficult to carry out the work in the small farm since she is tired by all the hard work. This is why she wants a loan from MFP, to open a small grocery store where she can take care of the people in the neighboring area. This will be her fourth loan with MFP and is very happy to know that she will be able to count on the financial support and continue following her dreams. Antonia is committed to paying her loan quotas on time so that she will be able have access to another in the future. With the 3,000 nuevos soles, Antonia will buy sacks of rice, sugar, preserves, spaghettis, and other items to start her new store.

loans.use: buy sacks of rice, sugar, preserves, spaghettis, and other items

loans.name: Yazmina

texts.es: Yamina y su cónyuge,  para generar ingresos, se dedican a dos actividades,  la venta de almuerzos y también ofrecen  servicios de alquiler de lavadoras; este último, aprovechando Yamina,  que su cónyuge  es experto en el mantenimiento de las máquinas.  Ellos con su microempresa han sacado adelante a su familia,  conformada por 4 hijos que hoy  se encuentran en las edades de 24 a 33 años. Su negocio lo hacen  estrictamente de contado y cada día su clientela crece y se extiende mas allá del barrio donde habitan, porque cuando le compran los almuerzos a Yamina, identifican el servicio de alquiler de lavadoras y un negocio oxigena al otro.  En la actualidad su potencial de crecimiento es mayor,  pero su capital de trabajo le resulta insuficiente para responder a la demanda del servicio de lavadoras y también para comprar por volúmenes materias primas e insumos para la preparación de los alimentos. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva,  primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante la cual comprará 2 lavadoras e insumos en mayor proporción, para  responder a su clientela y aumentar su producción. Con su credikiva aspira a lograr atender a un mayor número de clientes, los que  muchas veces se quedan  esperando que le alquilen las lavadoras, porque las de Yamina se encuentran ocupadas,  también comprará de contado y ahorrará en sus compras de materias primas, por descuentos y esto hace que su inversión tenga éxito. Su sueño es  ampliar su negocio y diariamente está revisando oportunidades en el mercado,  para seguirlo fortaleciendo
texts.en: Yamina and her partner to generate income, work in two different fields, they sell lunches and rent washing machines. Yamina’s partner’s expert knowledge in the maintenance of the washing machines helps them a great deal. With their small company they have been able to get their family ahead which is made up of 4 children who are now between 24 and 33 years of age. The business is strictly made cash down and each day the customer base grows and it extends over the neighborhood’s boundaries because when people buy Yamina’s lunches they recognize the washing machine loan business; one business helps the other. At present, their potential for growth is greater but they are low on working capital which is not enough to meet the demand for the washing machines as well as buying the raw materials and supplies to prepare the food. This will be her first loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo; she will buy 2 washing machines and supplies in greater quantities to meet her customers’ needs and to increase production. With her credikiva she hopes to take care of a greater quantity of customers who many times have to wait for an available washing machine because Yamina’s are occupied. She will also buy cash down the supplies to save in her raw material purchases for the lunches by receiving discounts, and in turn, her investment will be successful. Yamina’s dream is to expand her business as she searches daily for good sales to keep strengthening her businesses.

loans.use: buy 2 washing machines and supplies in greater quantities to prepare lunches.

loans.name: Diega Salvadora

texts.es: Diega de 45 años de edad es soltera, labora para el MINED  como docente  desde hace mas de 30 años. Esta solicitando su 10mo credito con el objetivo de hacer urgente un sumidero ya que la letrina se le esta cayendo y necesita se le apoye con este pequeño proyecto, pues quiere hacerlo antes que llegue el invierno.  Cabe señalar que la profesora Diega ha luchado por mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia utilizando los creditos para mejorar su casa, con el ultimo logro comprar zinc y reparar el techo de su cocina, y embaldozó la parte donde tiene ubicado el lavandero. Expreso que en el futuro desea hacer las divisiones de la casa, pues actualmente la casa donde habita es de ella y de su hermana y quieren dividirla para acondicionarla al gusto de cada una.
texts.en: Diega is 45 years old she is single and has worked for MINED (Ministry of Education) as a teacher for over 30 years. She is looking for her tenth loan to be able to make an emergency drain since the latrine is falling and she needs your support for this small project since she would like to fix it before winter arrives. It’s important to note that teacher Diega has worked hard to improve the quality of life of her family by using the loans to make improvements to the house; the last loan was used to buy zinc, repair the roof of her kitchen and tile the washing area. Diega said that in the future she would like to make divisions to the home since she lives with her sister and they would like to split the house to decorate according to each of their tastes.

loans.use: build a sewer drain.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 64 años es una mujer sabia. Vive en compañía de Andrés su esposo desde hace 45 años. Ambos tienen 8 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cullpa Baja. Ella vive en compañía de sus hijos, pues tiene una casa muy amplia donde cada uno vive independientemente y así no se siente sola con su esposo. Su actividad principal es su tienda de comestibles que abrió desde hace 21 años, en todo este tiempo lo surtió muy bien tanto así que cuenta con clientes fijos. También cuenta con 4 vacas, un toro, gallinas y cuyes, los cuales vende o consume de acuerdo a su necesidad. Como nunca descansa por temporadas siembra maíz y cebada, pero la alfalfa lo realiza constantemente para el alimento de sus animales. Estas siembras lo venden a un comerciante mayorista que la visita muy seguido ya que conoce de la calidad de sus tierras, que descansan un año para volver a producir el alimento. Ahora desea mejorar su tienda de comestibles, pues sabe que no tendrá la misma fuerza cuando envejezca más y solo tendrá que dedicarse a su negocio para subsistir. por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. María de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de vitrinas para renovar el aspecto de su tienda.
texts.en: María is 64 years old and is a wise woman. She lives with her husband Andrés, they have been together for some 45 years. They have 8 children but only 2 live with them in their home which is located in the Cullpa Baja. María lives with her children since she has ample space where each can live independently and she doesn’t feel so alone. María’s main work is her small grocery store that she opened 21 years ago and throughout all this time she has stocked it very well since she has a steady customer base. She also has 4 cows, a bull, chickens and cuyes (a rodent like animal) that she sells or eats according to her needs. Since María never rests, during the harvest season she grows corn and barley but she grows alfalfa constantly to feed her animals. The crops are sold to a wholesaler that visits her regularly since he knows the quality of her land, since it is left to rest for a year preparing it for another harvest. At present, María wishes to improve her small grocery store since she knows that when she grows older she won’t have the same strength and will only have her business to sustain her. She hopes for a small loan to be able to meet her objectives and promises to meet all of her payment quotas, besides she is happy to be a part of the organization because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. María after receiving your support will use the money to buy display cases to improve the appearance of her store.

loans.use: buy display cases.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy tools to improve his work as well as expand his workspace.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia, de 40 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos: Devid y Jack a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en Cullpa. Ella es una mujer admirable, pues hace poco se separó de su esposo, teniendo que afrontar la educación y crianza de sus hijos. Para ello trabaja sin descanso en el mercado de la ciudad, donde prepara comida para los visitantes y trabajadores, ya tiene 4 años dedicándose a esto; es muy conocida por sus clientes, que saben de su buena sazón. Ya por las tardes, abra las puertas de su tienda de comestibles, que abrió hace un año, ahí vende carnes, menestras, leche y demás productos. Paralelo a esto y como buena mujer del campo también cría vacas, cerdos, cuyes, gallinas y pavos que comercializa cuando los engorda. Pero como su lema es el trabajo constante, invierte sus tierras con una socia, para la elaboración de ladrillos. Ella pone la tierra y su socia la arcilla y chala para quemar los ladrillos. Al mes obtiene buenas ganancias, que le sirven para mantener los gastos del hogar y de sus hijos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los emprendedores” y este es el décimo tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Silvia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda.
texts.en: Silvia is 40 years old and is an easy going person. She lives with her 2 sons, Devid and Jack; she takes care of them in their own home located in Cullpa. Silvia is an admirable woman since a short while ago she separated from her husband and has the sole responsibility of educating and caring for her children. It is because of them that she works without rest in the city market where she prepares food for the tourists and workers. She has worked for some 4 years in this field and is very well known by her customers since they know she has good zest. In the afternoons she opens her food store that she opened a year ago and sells meats, vegetable soup, milk and other products. Parallel to this work, as a good country woman, she also breeds cows, pigs, cuyes (a rodent like animal), chickens and turkeys that she sells when she fattens them up. But since her motto is 'constant work' she also makes bricks. She puts the land and her partner puts the clay and green corn husks to burn the bricks. At the end of the month, she has good earnings that help her meet the household expenses as well as her children’s. Silvia belongs to the communal bank “the entrepreneurs” and this is her third loan with MFP, and hopes for a small loan that will allow her to meet her goals, she promises to meet the all of her payment quotas. Silvia is happy to be a part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. Silvia, after receiving your support will use the money to buy basic household goods for her store.

loans.use: buy basic household goods for her store.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es: Evelyn, de 28 años es una mujer hermosa. Vive en compañía de Pablo, su esposo desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Rosa y Josmel, a quienes cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Incho. Ella es una mujer trabajadora, ya que mientras su esposo trabaja en una empresa como chofer, trasportando diversos alimentos a todo el país. Ella se dedica a la crianza de cuyes, los cuales vende cada 3 meses según pedidos. Gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio logró obtener 200 ejemplares, los cuales aumenta con facilidad, pues sabe los separa de acuerdo a parentesco, embarazo y edad, de está manera obtiene mejor resultado en la crianza. Además tiene 4 toros pequeños, que espera criarlos para venderlos de la misma manera. Su secreto es sembrar alfalfa, de esa manera puede brindarles un buen alimento y minimizar costos. Ahora desea obtener una granja bien implementada, con la ayuda de su esposo quien obtiene buenas ganancias en su trabajo, espera concretarlo. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los emprendedores” y este es el décimo tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Evelyn de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de cemento para realizar el segundo piso de su cobertizo para sus animales.
texts.en: Evelyn is 28 years old, she is beautiful woman. She lives with Pablo her husband of 3 years and they have 2 children, Rosa and Josmel whom they take care of in their own home located in Incho. Evelyn is a hardworking woman and her husband works in a company as a chauffeur transporting different types of food throughout the country. Evelyn breeds cuyes (a rodent like animal), which she sells every 3 months depending on the orders. Thanks to her efforts and sacrifices, Evelyn was able to have 200 specimens that increase with ease since she knows how to separate them according to breed, pregnancy and age; this allows her to have better results when raising them. She also has 4 small bulls and hopes to breed them to sell them in the same way. Her secret is to grow alfalfa which provides her animals with food and decreases costs. Evelyn with the help of her husband, who earns good wages, wishes to have a farm that’s well kept and they hope to achieve that goal. She belongs to the "entrepreneurs” communal bank,   this is her third loan with MFP and hopes for the small loan to help her meet her goals. Evelyn promises to meet her payment quotas. She is also happy to be part of the communal bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. Evelyn after receiving your support will use the money to buy cement to build a second roof in the shed for her animals.

loans.use: buy cement to build a roof for her stable.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 48 años es una mujer sencilla. Hace 24 años enviudó, desde entonces cuida de sus 4 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con 3 de ellos; en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Cullpa. A pesar de que sus hijos son mayores y ya conformaron su familia. Ella continua viviendo con ellos, pues siempre soñó con criar a sus nietas. Su principal actividad económica es la crianza de ganado vacuno, posee 5 vacas de las cuales extrae la leche que producen y las vende a sus vecinos quienes conocedores de la rica leche que producen sus animales le comprar todos los días. Además de criar ovejas y gallinas para su consumo, pero cuenta que si tiene cualquier eventualidad los vende engordándolos al mercado. Pero la actividad que le ayudó a criar a sus hijos, sola, es el bordado de fustanes típicos que comercializa a buen precio, ya que tarda mucho tiempo en terminar de bordarlos. Ahora solo realiza un promedio de uno al mes, porque ya no tiene la necesidad de antes. Por el momento desea vivir mucho tiempo para ver a sus nietas crecer y a velar por su familia. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los emprendedores” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. María de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fardos de pasto para la alimentación de sus animales. Además de la su chequeo médico con el veterinario.
texts.en: María is 48 years old and is an easygoing person. Some 24 years ago she became a widow and ever since she has taken care of her 4 children of which 3 live with her in their home in the Cullpa area. Despite that her children are adults and have formed families of their own, she still lives with them since she always dreamed of caring for her grandchildren. María mostly works cattle raising, she has 5 cows and milks them and sells the product to her neighbors who know the delicious milk that her animals make each day. María also raises sheep and chickens for consumption but says that if she has any unexpected expense she will sell them after fattening them up. The work that helped María raise her children alone is embroidering native petticoats that she sold at good prices since she takes a while to make them. María now makes one a month since she doesn’t have the need to produce so many as before. At present, she wishes to live a long time to see her granddaughters grow and to take care of her family. María belongs to the “entrepreneurs” communal bank and this is her fourth loan with MFP, she hopes for a small loan to help her meet her goals and promises to meet all of her payment quotas. María, after receiving your support, will use the money to buy bales of grass to feed her animals as well as a medical check up with a veterinarian.

loans.use: buy grass and take her animals to a veterinarian.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor Manuel es un señor de 36 años que vive con su esposa e hijos en un pequeño pueblo en la provincia de Guanacaste llamado la Garita. La Garita es una planicie de clima bastante cálido donde se desarrollan actividades tales como la ganadería, Agricultura y el Turismo Rural.

Desde hace dos años Víctor Manuel dio inicio a su negocio en el cual se dedica a la apicultura y ha notado que los vecinos de su comunidad se muestran muy satisfechos con todo lo producido hasta el momento. Además dice que el proyecto le es muy interesante ya que ha visto como poco a poco su negocio crece y la demanda va incrementando.

Actualmente Víctor Manuel está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢600.000 (seiscientos mil colones) para la compra del insumo que conlleva esta actividad, para terminar de sacar la producción. Específicamente necesitan estañones para almacenar la miel, envases para sacarla al mercado, lo que también requiere de un medio de transporte para distribuirla. Con esto el espera hacer crecer más su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida. Su negocio va bien pero por falta de dinero no ha podido hacerlo crecer más. 

Víctor Manuel es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal La Garita una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Espera poder seguir participando de manera más activa en este tipo de organizaciones. Y nos afirma que la ECC ha tenido gran impacto en la comunidad, ya que antes no tenían oportunidades para ayudar económicamente a los habitantes.
texts.en:
Víctor Manuel is a 36 year old man who lives with his wife and children in a small town in the province of Guanacaste called La Garita. La Garita is in a plain, its climate is very warm and most of the inhabitants work in cattle raising, agriculture and rural tourism.

Víctor Manuel started his business two years ago as a beekeeper and has noticed that his neighbors are vey happy with everything he has produced at the moment. He says that his work is very interesting since he has seen how his business and demand has grown.

At present, Víctor Manuel needs a loan of ¢600.000 (six hundred thousand colones) to buy the merchandize necessary for his work and finish extracting the product. Specifically he needs containers to store the honey, bottles to sell it in the market, as well as transportation to distribute his product. He hopes that with these items his business will continue to grow as well as his quality of life. Víctor Manuel’s business is doing well but without money he has not been able to make it grow to its full potential.

Víctor Manuel is a member of the La Garita Communal Bank, one of 150 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica. He hopes to be able to continue being an active member in these types of organizations and asserts that the ECC has had a great impact in the community since the people did not have the financial opportunities they have now.

loans.use: buy merchandize for his beekeeping business.

loans.name: Luse

texts.en:
Luse is seventy-four years of age and is married with seven children. She owns & operates a business venture, selling hand-made crafts.  She has 10 years of experience in this business.    

Luse needs a loan of WST $2000 to purchase additional crafts to sell.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 talas or US $208 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2008, Luse joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Luse's 3rd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase more crafts for sale.

loans.name: Luciano

texts.en:
Luciano is single and he is 38 years old, residing at Taguitic, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte, Philippines.

Luciano operates a fishing business, selling seafood products including crabs and shrimp in the local community to earn a living. He has been in this business for four years. Each month, he earns 3,500 PHP.

Luciano is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase fishing equipment including hooks & nets. Luciano is been a member of GDMPC for a year. 

In the future, Luciano wants to save as a reserve for future emergencies and improve his living condition.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment including hooks & nets

loans.name: Merilyn

texts.en:
Merilyn is 49 years old, widowed, and has three children.  She is from Lintugop, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. To make a living, Merilyn makes nipa huts roofs, which are traditional roofs of the Filipinos. She sells them in the local community. Merilyn has been engaged in this business for over two years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month. 

Merilyn is requesting a loan for 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase materials to make a nipa roof products. In 2011, Merilyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to manufacture additional products

loans.name: Doren

texts.en: Doren is from Calamba, Misamis Occidental. Doren is 36 years old. Doren is married and has four children. To make a living, Doren owns and operates a cafeteria business, selling and cooking foods in the local community. Doren sells it in her cafeteria to "suki" eaters (regular customers). Doren has been engaged in her business for over six years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month from these activities. Doren is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used as additional capital for her cafeteria like kitchen utensils and food ingredients such as vegetables and fork, chicken or beef. In Doren joined GDMPC to seek financial assistance as additional investment in her business. She plans to use the income generated to expand her business and save a portion of it for her future and for her children.

loans.use: additional capital for her cafeteria like kitchen utensils and food ingredients such as vegetables and fork, chicken or beef

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is a married woman with four children. Elsa is 33 years old and resides at Libertad, Sapang Dalaga: Philippines. Elsa owns & operates a business selling fish to the local community to earn a living and she's been in this business for five years. Each month, she earns 5,500 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 11,000 PHP to have additional capital for fish production to purchase bicycle with sidecar to carry the container. Elsa has been a member of GDMPC for a year. In the future, Elsa wants to build a house and to finish the study of her children.

loans.use: additional capital for fish production to purchase bicycle with sidecar to carry the container

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, de 35 años es una mujer responsable. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos: José Andrés y Janeth a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cullpa Baja. Es una mujer admirable, pues cuida de sus hijos, sola. Se ingenia para poder ganar dinero, ya que su único sustento es la crianza de cerdos, cuenta con 15 ejemplares; que engorda y cuida con mucha dedicación , ya que vende su carne por pedidos y en ocasiones le comprar vivos, “todo depende del cliente”, afirma. Le va muy bien en este negocio, obtiene buenos ingresos que le permiten criar a sus hijos. Pero para llevar un ingreso extra al hogar también trabaja como peón en diferentes sembríos por temporadas de cosecha como también en las ladrilleras de su localidad. Pues su objetivo es aprovechar la temporada para que le paguen mucho más. Ahora desea abrir un restaurante en su casa, ya que no existe una en su localidad y el comercio es intenso, por ello quiere aprovechar esa necesidad. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los emprendedores” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Julia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en: Julia is 35 years old and is a very responsible woman. She lives with her two children, José Andrés and Janeth whom she takes care of in her own home located in the Cullpa Baja. She is an admirable woman since she takes care of her children by herself and devises ways to make money since her only source of income is raising pigs, she has 15. Julia fattens them up and cares for them with a lot of devotion since she sells their meat by orders and sometimes sells them alive “it all depends on the customer,” she says. Julia does very well in this business and she also works as a farmhand in different farms during the harvest season. She also works in a brick making company in her neighborhood. Her goal is to take advantage of the season so that they will pay her more. Julia now wishes to open a restaurant in her home since there isn’t one in her neighborhood and there a lot of companies and she wants to take advantage of the opportunity. Julia belongs to the community bank “the entrepreneurs,” this is her first loan with MFP and hopes for a small loan to meet her goals and promises to meet all of her payment quotas. Julia is grateful to be a part of the organization because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. Julia after receiving your support will use the money to buy balanced food for her animals.

loans.use: buy food for her animals.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén, de 61 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de sus padres en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Huancayo. Trabaja sin descanso para cuidar de sus 2 hijos a los que quiere con mucho amor. Kenyu y Kensi como se llaman, estudian educación superior en una reconocida universidad. Se siente feliz por ello y continua trabajando en el trasporte de carga, para poder pagar sus estudios. Su trabajo consiste en el traslado de alimentos, artefactos, materiales a cualquier punto del país de acuerdo a las necesidades de los clientes que prestan su servicio. Paralelo a ese trabajo administra una empresa de baños públicos con ducha y agua caliente, este trabajo es eventual pues él gerencia el mantenimiento y los posibles dificultades que se presenten, ahí percibe un sueldo mensual que le permite ahorrar un poco. Ahora planea comprarse una camioneta más grande, que tenga una capacidad de 2 toneladas de carga de esa manera podrá tener más clientes y por ende ganar más dinero. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde esta muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de su cuota. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Rubén de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de llantas nuevas para su camioneta, pues necesita pasar revisión técnica.
texts.en: Sixty-one-year-old Rubén is a hardworking man.  He lives with his parents in his own home, located in the Huancayo area.  He works ceaselessly to take care of his two children whom he loves deeply.  Kenyu and Kensi, as they are called, are pursuing a higher education at a well-known university.  He is very happy about that and continues to work transporting cargo to be able to pay for their education.  His works consists of transporting food, devices, and materials all over the county, according to the needs of the customers he's serving.  Along with this work, he manages a business for public bathrooms with hot water.  This work is not full time, as he manages maintenance and the possible problems that arise.  He receives a monthly salary from this that allows him to save a little.  At the moment he plans to buy a bigger truck with a capacity of two tons.  This will allow him to have more customers and, by extension, make more money.  This is his fifth loan with MFP, where he is very happy to know that he has financial support, as this makes him feel secure in moving forward with his work.  He also promises to make his payments.  Furthermore, he likes being part of the association because all of its members are responsible and supportive people.  Upon receiving your help, Rubén will invest the requested money in the purchase of new tires for his truck, as it needs to pass technical inspection.

loans.use: to buy new tires

loans.name: Johanna Del Carmen

texts.es: Johanna del Carmen es un emprendedora con éxito ya que con muchos esfuerzos ha emprendido su propio negocio esto lo emprende por la falta de empleo y la necesidad de generar ingresos para la familia. Johanna ya ha tenido crédito con fundación lo cual ha sido una persona responsable y ella nos explica que gracias al apoyo que se le ha brindado ha aumentado su inventario y su clientela. Johanna esa nuevamente solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de mercadería como variedad de ropa, cosmético, zapatos entre otros productos que demandan sus clientes.
texts.en:
Johanna del Carmen is a successful entrepreneur who, with much effort, started her own business because she had no job and needed an income for the family.  She already received a loan through the foundation and proved herself to be very responsible.  She says that thanks to this support she has been able to increase her inventory and customer base. 

Johanna is requesting a new loan to buy a variety of clothing, cosmetics, shoes and other products requested by her customers.

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothing, cosmetics, shoes and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: stock her store with foodstuffs like beans, corn, rice, tuna, sugar, salt and other items.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es: Zenaida, de 43 años es una mujer seria. Vive en compañía de Fernando, su esposo. Ambos tienen 7 hijos, pero solo viven con 5 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cullpa Baja. Se siente desarrollada; pues gracias al esfuerzo de su esposo y ella misma pudo adquirir una fábrica de ladrillos. Cuenta que todos la ayudan: sus hijas y yernos; por eso se siente feliz, ya que puede brindar un apoyo a su familia, “el trabajo es muy duro y se necesita de muchas personas”, afirma Zenaida. Ya tiene 20 años de experiencia en su negocio, es por ello que siempre cuenta con pedidos de clientes fijos. Al mes realiza 22 millares vendiendo estos a buen precio en la misma fábrica sin tener que trasladarlos a otro lugar. Ahora desea comprar nuevos hornos de mayor tecnología, pues solo lo realiza de manera rústica el quemado de los ladrillos que realiza junto a su familia. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los emprendedores” y este es el decimoséptimo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Zenaida de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de aserrín para la realización de los ladrillos.
texts.en: Zenaida is 43 years old and is a serious woman; she lives with her husband, Fernando. Together they have 7 children but only 5 live with them in their own home located in the Cullpa Baja area. Zenaida feels fulfilled since thanks to her husband’s and her efforts they were able to acquire a brick factory. She says that everyone helps her, her daughters and sons in law, it is because of this that she feels happy since she is able to bring some support to her family. “The work is very hard and we need a lot of people,” Zenaida says. She has over 20 years of experience in this business and it is because of that, that she is able to have so many steady customers. She makes some 22 thousand bricks a month and sells them at a good price in the factory without having to spend money on transportation. Zenaida wishes to buy new ovens with modern technology since she makes them the old fashioned way, by burning them with help of her family. Zenaida belongs to the “entrepreneurs” community bank and this is her seventeenth loan with MFP and hopes for a small loan to meet her goals and promises pay all of her quotas. She is grateful to be a part of the organization because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. Zenaida after receiving the loan will use the money to buy sawdust to make the bricks.

loans.use: buy sawdust to make bricks.

loans.name: Susana Zoila

texts.es: La  socia  Susana,  continua con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia esta muy bien y ha aumentado el numero de sus clientes, la socia desea invertir el prestamo en esta ocasion y como siempre en la compra de productos de primera necesidad que salen a diario como arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, aceite, entre otros, la socia implementara su tienda para tener mas ventas.
texts.en: Susana continues to work in her small grocery store; the member is doing very well and has increased the number of her customers. Susana hopes to use the loan once more to buy basic household goods that are used daily like rice, sugar, milk, spaghettis, oil and other items; she will use them to have more sales in her store.

loans.use: buy basic household goods.

loans.name: Carlos Eduardo

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven de 21 años de edad, el vive en la ciudad de mala, ubicada al sur de la capital de nuestro país, muy conocida por su clima y por su actividad principal que es la agricultura;, presenta también una zona geográfica destacada, llamada "Los Platanales", constituida por terrenos antaño muy húmedos y salitrosos, donde afloraba abundante agua del subsuelo debido a la presencia de una napa freática situada a poca profundidad, que hacía propicios dicho terrenos para el cultivo de frutales como el plátano maleño y la vid. Carlos como buen peruano le gusta mucho la comida pero su plato favorito es la exquisita “Sopa Seca”; Carlos estudio hasta el quinto año de secundaria, pero en su afán por seguir estudiando ha tomado cursos técnicos para reparación de celulares.

Carlos trabaja en su negocio de venta y reparación de celulares, se dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 14 horas diarias y es que el se levanta muy temprano para poder atender su negocio y puede atender hasta 18 clientes por dia; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque brinda una buena atención a los clientes asi como también entrega los pedidos a tiempo y vende productos de calidad.

Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar más mercadería y para comprar una máquina para la reparación de celulares, con esta mejora podrá tener más variedad de productos asi como también tener la herramienta adecuada para la realización de su trabajo, con ello tendrá mayores ingresos y podrá seguir ahorrando para lograr su más grande sueño:” Tener sucursales de su negocio”.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young man at 21 years old, he lives in a city called Mala, which is located to the south of our country's capital. It is well known for its climate and for its main activity, which is agriculture. 

It is also in a noteworthy geographic region, called "Los Plantanales", which was created years ago by very humid, salty ground. Here, water from the subsoil rises to the surface, due to the presence of groundwater not far below the surface, and has provided these lands with favourable conditions for growing fruit trees, such as banana trees and vines.

Carlos, like any good peruvian, really enjoys food, but his favourite dish is the exquisite "Sopa Seca", a typical Peruvian dish of spaghetti and chicken with a spicy sauce. Carlos is studying for his fifth year of secondary school, but, in his desire to continue studying, he has taken technical classes teaching how to repair cell phones. 

Carlos works in his own business selling and repairing cell phones, he works around 14 hours a day and gets up very early to attend to his business and he can serve up to 18 customers per day. He believes that his business is going very well as it attracts good attention from customers and he delivers orders on time and sells good quality products.

Carlos is very grateful for the Kiva loan providers, as it is thanks to their support that he will be able to buy more merchandise and buy a machine for repairing cell phones. With these he will be able to have a better variety of products as well as having adequate equipments to carry out his work. In this way he will have improved income and will be able to continue saving to achieve his greatest dream: "To have branches of his business"

loans.use: to buy merchandise and a machine.

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
This is Maribeth, age 45 and a resident of Manila, Philippines.  She is married to Virgilio, and a mother to their four children.  She, together with her husband and children, manage their own household while operating the business.  At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Maribeth operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood.  It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5 worth of cooking oil or an egg.  She earns her income by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece.  Her store is located adjacent to her house.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 400 in sales every day.

To help her continue operationing her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan.  She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.  She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Maribeth dreams to be able to give her all her children a good and high quality education through all of her hard work in her business.  She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa Obdulia es una señora de 56 años que vive con su esposo e hijos en un pequeño pueblo en Guanacaste llamado la Garita. La Garita es una planicie de clima bastante cálido donde se desarrollan actividades tales como la ganadería, Agricultura y el Turismo Rural.

Desde hace varios años Rosa Obdulia se dedica a su bazar/librería, tiene a cargo su local y los vecinos de su comunidad se muestran muy satisfechos por el servicio brindado. Dice que tener el apoyo y la ayuda de su esposo le facilita seguir con el proyecto. Además dice que el proyecto le es muy interesante ya que ha visto como poco a poco su negocio crece y la demanda cada vez es más fuerte.

Actualmente Rosa Obdulio está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢600.000 (seiscientos mil colones) para la compra de materiales didácticos para su negocio. Con esto ella espera hacer crecer más su microempresa y mejorar su calidad de vida. 

Rosa Obdulia es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal La Garita una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su segundo crédito, y espera poder seguir participando de manera más activa en este tipo de organizaciones.
texts.en:
Rosa Obdulia is a 56 year old woman; she lives with her husband and children in a small town in Guanacaste called la Garita. La Garita is in a plain, its climate is very warm and most of the inhabitants work in cattle raising, agriculture and rural tourism.

For some years Rosa Obdulia has worked in her variety store/bookstore, she is in charge of her store and the neighbors in her community are very happy with the service she provides them. Rosa Obdulia says that she has the support and help of her husband who helps her continue working. She says that her work is very interesting since she has seen how her business and demand has grown.

At present Rosa Obdulia needs a loan of ¢600.000 (six hundred thousand colones) to buy educational materials for her business. She hopes that this investment will help her small company grow and improve her quality of life.

Rosa Obdulia is a member of La Garita Communal Bank, one of 150 member organizations of OEDESA in Costa Rica. This will be her second loan, and hopes to keep working in a more active way in these type of organizations.

loans.use: buy merchandize for her book and office supply store.

loans.name: Eliander

texts.es:
Eliander  tiene 30 años de edad  y vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada Las Bonitas de Platanares, localizada en Pérez Zeledón esto en la provincia de San Jose. Es una zona donde se presenta la actividad agropecuaria, los habitantes de la región en su mayoría son productores de café y de ganado doble propósito. 

El tiene el apoyo de su familia le facilita seguir con el proyecto. Además que el proyecto le es muy interesante ya que ha visto como poco a poco su negocio crece y la demanda cada vez es más fuerte y que los vecinos de la comunidad se han sentido satisfechos con el servicio brindado. 

Lo que en estos momentos solicita don Eliander es un micro crédito de ¢500,000(quinientos mil colones), para compra de unas prendas de ropa elegante y casual para su tienda llamada Eliander, para obtener mejores resultados en su proyecto al venderlas en su comunidad. 

Eliander es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de las Bonitas, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Con este primer préstamo se espera crecer más a nivel personal y económico. También destaca que gracias a este tipo de organizaciones y medios facilitadores de crédito puede dedicar más tiempo a las actividades productivas, y se tiene más información y acceso a créditos ya que con las entidades bancarias es muy difícil.
texts.en:
Elianer is 30 years old; he lives with his family in a neighborhood called Las Bonitas de Platanares, located in Pérez Zeledón, province of San Jose. This is an area that mostly deals with farming and stockbreeding; the people in the region are mostly coffee producers and cattle raisers. Elianer has the support of his family to keep his project alive since it is very interesting for him and he has seen it grow little by little as demand grew each time and the neighbors are satisfied with the service he provides them.

Don Elianer needs a loan of ¢500,000 (five hundred thousand colones), to buy elegant and casual clothing for his store named, Elianer. This loan will allow him to have better income when he sells the items in his community.

Elianer is a member of the Communal Bank “the Pretty Ones” one of 150 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica. This is his first loan and hopes to grow more in a personal and financial level. Elianer remarks that thanks to these types of organizations and loan assistance he is able to have more time to embark on productive activities and have access to more information and loans since with banks it is very difficult.

loans.use: buy elegant and casual clothing for his store.

loans.name: Rudi

texts.en: Rudi is a 24-year-old man. He is married to Sri, a 24-year-old lady. Rudi and Sri are blessed with two children – they are Rizky, 4 years old, attending kindergarten; and Haikal, 3 years old. To cover his family's needs and education fees, Rudi works as a motor taxi driver. Rudi has been involved in this business for the past four years. The income generated is unstable and insufficient to meet the family needs as well as Rizky’s schooling expenses. This situation led Rudi to initiate a new business that is selling petrol and mobile phone recharge. To start the business, Rudi needs capital amounting to 3,000,000 Indonesian rupiah from TLM. Rudi is hoping that TLM will approve his loan application.

loans.use: to purchase petrol and mobile phone recharge to resell

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es: Zoila de 69 años, es una muy buena mujer que desde muy joven trabajo mucho para poder brindar lo mejor que podía a sus cuatro hijos quienes ya son mayores e independientes. Ella tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su esposo, todos los días trabajan mucho para poder tener una vejez tranquila. Zoila siempre trabajó mucho por su familia, es así como desde muy joven realizó diferentes actividades y con eso pudo mantener a su familia durante mucho tiempo. Ahora tiene como negocio la venta de bebidas gaseosas, así como de cervezas. Trabaja sola y siempre tiene el producto a la temperatura perfecta para poder calmar la sed de sus clientes. Le esta yendo muy bien, ya que tiene buenos ingresos y siempre tiene muchos clientes que van en busca de saciar la sed por el incremento de la temperatura de la ciudad. Espera poder seguir trabajando mucho y empezar a vender algunas bebidas más. Este será el crédito número 10 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado está convencida de poder cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores cerditos que tuvo, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos sus integrantes son personas que son muy responsables y muy solidarias. Con el moto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará mas bebidas y algunos ingredientes e insumos para empezar a helados de frutas.
texts.en:
Zoila, 69 years old, is a very good woman who, from a young age, has worked hard to be able to offer the best possible life to her four children, who are now independent adults. She has her own home with her husband and everyday they work hard in order to have a peaceful old age.

Zoila has always worked hard for her family and since she was young she has worked in many different jobs. This is how she was able to support her family over a long period of time. 

Now, her business is selling soft drinks and beers. She works alone and always keeps her products at the perfect temperature to quench her customers' thirst. It is going well as she already makes a good income and always has lots of customers who are looking for something to quench their thirst because of the increase in temperature in the city. She hopes to be able to continue worked a lot and to start selling more drinks. 

This will be her 10th loan with MFP, she is very happy to know that she will have financial support, as it helps her feel safe to take her work forward. On the other had she is sure to be able to repay the loan according to the schedule, as she has with previous loans. She is also grateful to be part of her communal bank because all of the people are very responsible and caring. With the requested amount of 1200 sols, she will buy drinks and some ingredients and supplies to start making fruit ice creams.

loans.use: to buy more drinks like sodas and beers, as well as fruits to make ice creams.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es: Nieves, de 45 años es una valerosa madre soltera. Vive en compañía de 2 de sus 4 hijos: Jarol y Julissa a los que cuida en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Chilca. Su sonrisa es muestra de su vitalidad. Ella se dedica a la siembra de productos como papa, olluco y habas una vez al año, pero como desea tener productos de calidad, constantemente los cuida, abona y protege. Agradece a la agricultura, pues le permitió mantener a sus hijos, brindándoles los alimentos del día. Pero como no la ganancia no es estable, decidió incursionar en la costura, donde confecciona prendas de vestir de todo tamaño y calidad, cuenta que gana a las semana un promedio de 150 nuevos soles, pero en navidad, año nuevo y festividad agrícola de Santiago; en donde ella obtiene mejores ganancias. Ya tiene 20 años de experiencia viajando a las ferias de diferentes ciudades, pues lo que más vende son los mandiles que confecciona con mucha dedicación. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde esta muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de su cuota. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Nieves de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de mercadería como telas, blondas, para realizar los mandiles.
texts.en: Forty-five-year-old Nieves is a courageous single mother.  She lives with two of her four children, Jarol and Julissa, whom she cares for in her own home, which is located in the district of Chilca.  Her smile is proof of her vitality.  She grows produce such as potatoes, ulluco, and broad beans for a living, but because she wants to have quality produce, she constantly cares for, fertilizes, and protects them.  She is thankful for farming, as it allows her to take care of her children and offer them their daily meals.  But because her earnings are not stable, she decided to make an incursion into sewing, where she makes articles of clothing of all sizes and qualities.  She tells us that she earns an average of 150 nuevos soles per week, but during Christmas, New Year's, and the Santiago's agricultural festivities she earns more money.  She has 20 years of experience traveling to fairs in different cities, as the aprons that she sews with lot of dedication are what sell the best.  This is her third loan with MFP, where she is very happy in knowing that she has financial support, as this allows her to feel secure in moving forward with her business.  She also promises to make her payments.  Furthermore, she likes being part of the association because all of its members are responsible and supportive people.  Upon receiving your help, Nieves will invest the requested money in the purchase of merchandise such as fabrics and lace to make her aprons.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, and lace

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 46 years old and single.

George works hard to provide for his family. He runs a rice retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

George has borrowed and repaid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. He has been running the rice retail business for nine years and also earns an income from herbal products retailing.

George aspires to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es: Carmela, de 47 años, es una mujer que nunca le dijo no a ningún reto, siempre se mantuvo con fuerza y coraje para poder trabajar y así brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus cuatro hijos que crió sola ya que es madre soltera y de los cuales tres ya son mayores y solo Sandra de 16 años aún depende de ella. Carmela vive a lado de su menor hija en su casa propia. El trabajo de Carmela consiste en la venta de comida, desde muy temprano trabaja yendo al mercado en busca de los mejores ingredientes y las verduras mas seleccionadas, de ahí en su casa prepara los distintos platos para que pueda ofrecer a sus clientes. En su casa acondiciono un lugar en donde atiende a sus clientes, lleva siete años en el negocio y al principio trabajaba en otras actividades pero con el tiempo tuvo que cambiar ya que no le brindaba muchas ganancias. Al principio tenía muchas dudas y dificultades, pero gracias al apoyo de su familia pudo superarlos. Ahora está muy contenta ya que trabaja tranquila con el apoyo de todos ellos. Le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene muy buenos clientes que van en busca de su buen trato y excelente sazón. Desea mas adelante poner su restaurante y así seguir trabajando. Este será el crédito numero 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en el crédito anterior que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos ya que si compra en mayor cantidad le sale mas cómodo y le permite tener mayor ganancia.
texts.en: Carmela is 47 years old, she is woman who never says ‘no’ to any challenge, she has the strength and courage to keep working and give her four children a better quality of life. She raised her four children alone as a single mother, three are adults and only Sandra, 16, still depends on her financially, they live together in their own home. Carmela works selling food, she wakes up very early in the morning and goes to the market in search of the best ingredients and vegetables, then she goes home to prepare different dishes to offer her customers. Carmela began her business some 7 years ago when she set up a spot in her home to take care of her customers. In the beginning she worked other jobs but they didn’t yield her a lot of income. At first Carmela had many doubts and problems but thanks to her family’s support she was able to overcome them and is now very happy as she works peacefully. Carmela is doing very well since she has very good customers who seek her out for her kind demeanor and excellent taste.  In the future she hopes to set up a restaurant and keep working. This is her second loan with MFP and hopes for your support to keep meeting her goals and is committed to meeting her payment quotas on time just as she did with her last loan. With the 1200 soles, Carmela will buy ingredients and supplies, since buying in greater quantities is easier and she receives better profits.

loans.use: buy raw materials to prepare food.

loans.name: Alvaro Jesus

texts.es: El joven Alvaro  es soltero, tiene 19 años de edad,  Alvaro estudia computacion e informatica  en un instituto de prestigio, alvaro eligió esta profesión porque  es su vocación y por que tiene habilidades para las computadoras  a su vez estudia musica que le ha perimito trabajar los fines de semana como disc jockey,   Alvaro sabe que todo esfuerzo es recompensado, Su sueño de Alvaro es brindarle  a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida y de alguna forma devolverle a ellos todo lo que hicieron por él, con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar una computadora que le ayudara con su carrera y su trabajo . Sabemos que Alavaro  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Young Alvaro is single, 19 years old and is studying computer science in a prestigious institute. Alvaro chose this profession because it’s his vocation and has the ability to work with computers. He also studies music; this has given him the experience to work during the weekends as a disk jockey. Alvaro knows that hard work is rewarded and his dream is to give his parents a better quality of life and somehow repay them for all that they have done for him.  To keep growing professionally, he is asking for a new loan to buy a computer that will help him in his career and work. We know that Alvaro will meet his goals with a lot of effort and hard work and that the loans from Edaprospo will help.

loans.use: buy a computer.

loans.name: Cinthia

texts.es: Cinthia, de 24 años es una mujer buena y amable, es conviviente con Iver de 25 años y con quien tiene un hijo Alan de 4 años, ellos viven en una casa propia y ahí comparten la alegría de criar a su menor hijo por quien trabajan mucho para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Cinthia consiste en la venta de comida, desde muy temprano inicia su labor cuando va al mercado en busca de los mejores ingredientes, ahí ella aprovecha para también poder hacer el mercado de la comida diaria, una vez en su casa comienza a preparar sus deliciosos platos que le han hecho muy conocida en su cuadra, lleva realizando este trabajo por 4 años y lo hace sola ya que su pareja trabaja en otras actividades. Le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que tiene mucho tiempo para poder dedicar a su menor hijos quien esta en edad que tienen que tenerle mucho cuidado, además este trabajo le permite tener muy buenos ingresos ya que antes de empezar a trabajar siempre tenían problemas con la economía y no alcanzaba para algunas necesidades del hogar, tiene como meta el de seguir creciendo y en algún momento poner su propio restaurante. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado esta muy comprometido una vez mas a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para seguir realizando su trabajo, ademas necesita refaccionar algunas sillas y mesas para atender mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en: Cinthia is 24 years old, and is a vey good and kind person. She lives with her partner, Iver who is 25 years old; they have a 4 year old son named Alan. They live in their own home and share the happiness of raising their young son who gives them with the drive to work hard to provide him a better quality of life. Cinthia’s job is to sell food; she wakes up early every morning and goes to the market in search of the best ingredients. She also buys the food necessary for daily food and once at home she begins to prepare her delicious dishes that have made her very well known in her block. She has worked in this field for 4 years; she works alone since her partner works another job. Cinthia enjoys her work very much since it allows her time to take care of her young child who is at an age that requires a lot of care, besides, her job allows her the opportunity to have a good income since before they had a lot of financial problems and there wasn’t enough money to meet the household expenses. Cinthia’s goal is to keep her business growing and to have her own restaurant. This will be her second loan with MFP and hopes for your support to keep her dreams alive and is very committed to meeting all of her payment quotas on time as she has done in the past. With the 1200 soles, she will buy ingredients and supplies to keep working, as well as fixing some chairs and tables to take better care of her customers.

loans.use: buy raw materials to prepare food, as well as fixing some chairs and tables.

loans.name: Loyda Yalu

texts.es: La señora Loyda, es nacida en la localidad de Rosario de la ciudad de  Chuquisaca,  tiene 25  años y es soltera, actualmente vive en el zona Roca, ella se dedica a la elaboración,  producción y comercialización  de pan casero y empanas. Los comercializa en su mismo domicilio y también reparte a diferentes tiendas de su zona hace 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad, se levanta desde tempranas horas de la mañana para elaborar sus masas y luego para la comercialización, ella es casada y Tiene 2 hijos de los cuales los 2 son dependientes, La señora demuestra ser responsable y muy trabajadora, El crédito otorgado a la señora es para la compra de insumos (harina, manteca y otros) para su negocio. La señora esta muy agradecida con la institución EMPRENDER por confiar en ella y pode darle la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Loyda was born in the Rosario area of the city of Chuquisaca.  She is 25 years old and she is single.  She currently lives in the Roca area.  She makes, produces, and sells homemade bread and empanadas.  She sells them from her own home and she also delivers them to different stores in her area.
