For that reason, he is turning to the office of MFP to apply for a loan, and in this way he can carry out the maintenance of his plantings, that is, by buying compost that can help him take care of his product. This is his first loan with MFP. He is happy to know that he can count on the financial support since in this way he can continue with his plans to continue working. With the 1000 PEN, he will be able to buy fertilizer and compost to maintain his plantings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and compost

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia, de 49 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Armando, su esposo desde hace 23 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo viven con una de ellas Karina a la que apoyan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ancala. Ella cuida de su nieto mientras pueda pues su hija trabaja. Su principal actividad económica es la confección de mandiles típicos que las mujeres utilizan como vestimenta diaria, le va muy bien en su trabaja tanto así que viaja a las diferentes ciudades para venderlas por unidad, ya que de esa manera puede obtener mayores ganancias, pero en festividades realiza por mayor ya que recibe pedidos. Además se dedica a la compra y venta de menestras, las cuales lleva ala mercado mayorista por cantidad, ahí obtiene un dinero extra. Por su parte su esposo trabaja en el trasporte público con un ómnibus que adquirió gracias a su esfuerzo, la cual le sirve para trasladar a los pobladores de la ciudad de Cochas hacía el centro de Huancayo. Ella se siente muy feliz, pues sus hijos mayores le mandan constantemente una mensualidad, gusta de verlos desarrollados. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “mollecito” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde esta muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de su cuota. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Antonia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de materiales para realizar los mandiles, además de menestras para su negocio.
texts.en:
Antonia, 49 years old, is a hard working woman. She lives with Armando, her husband of 23 years. They have 4 children, but only live with one of them, Karina, who they support in their own home, located in the village of Ancala. She takes care of her grandson while she can as her daughter works.

Her main business is making traditional aprons, which the woman use as everyday wear. It is going very well as she travels to different cities to sell them per unit, this is already how she makes the best incomes, but at festivals she sells wholesale as she receives orders. She also works in the buying and selling of dried vegetables, which she takes to the wholesale market in bulk and earns some extra money.

For his part, her husband works in public transport with a bus that he acquired thanks to her work, which he uses to transport the residents of the city of Cochas to the centre of Huancayo. She is very happy as her oldest children always send her an allowance and she likes to see them doing well.

She belongs to the solidarity group "mollecito" and this is the ninth loan with MFP, she is very happy knowing that she will have financial support and feels safe to advance her business. On the other hand, she promises to fulfil her repayments according to the schedule. She is also thankful to be part of her association because all of the members are responsible and caring. On receiving her support, Antonia will invest the requested money in the purchase of materials to make aprons, as well as dried vegetables for her business.

loans.use: to buy materials to make aprons, as well as to buy dried vegetables.

loans.name: Marleny Asunciona

texts.es:
Marleny es una madre de 27 años que se dedica sola a su pequeña familia y en estos ha hecho muchas cosas para demostrarse a sí misma que es capaz de superar cualquier obstáculo y mejorar día a día con la sola idea de sacarse adelante ella misma mediante su negocio y el apoyo de su propia familia.

Cuando ella se quedo sola no tenía muy en claro a que se podía dedicar debido a que lamentablemente solo tuvo estudios escolares y no universitarios por las distintas dificultades que sufría su familia. Es por todos estos motivos que hace 3 años se le ocurrió incursionar en la venta de abarrotes y con mucho esfuerzo ha surgido mucho y ha mejorado la variedad de sus productos. Todo esto lo hace básicamente por su pequeño hijo, quien es el que necesita mucho apoyo de su parte, ella desea poder darle los estudios necesarios y cubrir sus necesidades.

Marleny desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarla y así ella pueda comprar mucha más mercadería (Leche,productos de limpieza,bebidas gasificadas, entre otros) a un mejor precio y tener un mayor surtido de productos que ofrecer. Con las nuevas ideas que tenga de mejorar y la experiencia que continúe ganando ella saldrá adelante y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marleny is a 27 year old single mother who is completely dedicated to her small family, and who has done many things to prove that she can overcome any obstacle and improve each day, with the sole idea that she can get herself ahead through her business and with help from her family.

When she found herself alone, she wasn’t sure what she could dedicate herself to doing, because she did not have a university education, due to various difficulties that her family had.  This motivated her to begin selling groceries three years ago and with great effort she was able increase the variety of products.  She does all of this mainly for the sake her young son, who needs lots of support from her.  She wants to set some money aside for his education and also provide for his needs.

Marleny is hoping that the Kiva lenders can help her so that she can buy more merchandise (milk, cleaning products, and carbonated drinks, among other things) at a better price and have a greater variety of products to offer.  Her new ideas for improving her business, along with her experience, and her continuing to earn, she will come out ahead and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more vegetables (eddos, potatoes, oranges, and plantains) for her business.

loans.name: Shek Hamed

texts.en:
This is forty-two-year-old Shek. He is married, and has three children aged five, seven and nine. He has two additional dependents, who live with him to assist with the household chores. 

In 2002, Shek established his compressor, fan, copper wire, dryer and gas business. He started the business after graduating from the technical school. The business deals with cooling systems and accessories. Working seven days a week and twelve hours a day, he earns about SLL 1,300,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan of SLL 3,000,000. 

Shek has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to buy compressors and fans for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately SLL 400,000. In the future, Shek plans to improve the shop. He hopes to own a larger shop with enough stock and to give his children better education. 

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for compressors and fans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand and paint and to pay for labour.

loans.name: Uriel

texts.es: Uriel, de 29 años es un padre responsable. Vive en compañía de Ángel su pequeño hijos al que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Sicaya. Sabe que tiene que trabajar con esmero para sacar a su hijo adelante. Por ello todas las mañanas cuida de sus cultivos de maíz y zanahoria. Los que después de cada cosecha vende a un mercado conocido en la capital del país, donde viaja constantemente. Gracias a su trabajo logró adquirir una hectárea de terreno agrícola propio y otras 4 parcelas que alquila para todo el año. Además trabaja como operador de maquinaria pesada para una empresa, donde gana una considerable suma de dinero. Ahora el desea juntar dinero para comparar su propio tractor y así realizar su trabajo de manera independiente. Pues ahora que está pequeño su hijo puede ahorrar con más facilidad. Él pertenece al grupo solidario San Miguel y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Uriel de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de zanahoria.
texts.en:
Uriel, age 29, is a responsible father. He lives with Ángel, his young son who he care for in his own home in the town of Sicaya. Uriel knows that he must work diligently in order to help his son get ahead. Every morning, he cares for his corn and carrot crops. After each harvest, he sells his products at a well-known market in the capital where he visits frequently. Thanks to his work, Uriel was able to acquire a hectare of farmland. He also rents four parcels of additional land throughout the year. In addition, Uriel works for a company as a heavy machine operator and earns a considerable amount of money. He is saving because he wants to use the money to buy his own tractor and be able to work independently. Since his son is still young, he is able to save more easily.

Uriel is a member of the of the San Miguel solidarity group. This is his third loan with MFP and he hopes to receive cooperation so that he can move forward with his plans. As a result, he promises to complete his loan payments. In addition, Uriel is pleased to be part of his group because all of the members are responsible and support individuals. With the assistance he will receive, Uriel will invest in the purchase of natural fertilizers that will be applied on his crop of carrots.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Mamlakatkhon

texts.ru:
Мамлакатхон  52 года, замужем, имеет троих детей. С 2004 года, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Мамлакатхон начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS), приносящий стабильный доход от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. Также, Мамлакатхон занимается заготовкой и продажей сухофруктов, и на сегодняшний день имеет заготовленную партию орехов на сумму 70,000 сом (KGS).  
Доходы от такой деятельности позволили Мамлакатхон оплатить обучение младшей дочери  в университете.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мамлакатхон обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. В будущем, Мамлакатхон хочет увеличить хозяйство и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Mamlakatkhon is 52 years old, married and has three children.  In search of an income source for her family, Mamlakatkhon started her own business in animal husbandry in 2004 with an initial sum of 10,000 som (KGS), which now yields a stable income from the sales of milk and meat products.  She is also involved in preparing and selling dried fruits and today has a ready inventory of nuts, valued at 70,000 som (KGS).  The earnings from this business allowed Mamlakatkhon to repay her youngest daughter's university education.  In order to further develop her business, Mamlakatkhon requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase livestock.  In the future, she wants to increase her farm and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Abu Bakarr

texts.en:
This is 53 year-old Abu Bakarr. He is married and has 5 children ages 3, 5, 7, 12, and 15 years. He has 3 additional dependents who live with him because they are the children of his late brother. 

In 2001, Abu Bakarr established his used shoes business. The business caters for all ages. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about  1,700,100 Sierra Leone leones every month from this business.

Abu Bakarr would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. He has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan, and now requires a new loan in order to buy more used shoes for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000.

In the future, Abu Bakarr plans to expand the business and move to a bigger shop. He hopes to open outlets around town and have employees in these outlets. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for used shoes.

loans.name: Cheinor

texts.en: This is 35-year-old Cheinor. He is married and has one child who is four years old. He has no other dependants. In 1996, Cheinor established his business selling garri (made of cassava), palm oil, charcoal and wood. He began his business because he wanted to provide for his family. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about 1,000,000 SLL every month from this business. He would like a loan of 3,000,000 SLL. He requires this new loan in order to buy more garri and palm oil for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL. In the future, Cheinor plans to give his child a quality education and send him to the university. He wishes to express his thanks to you for your support.

loans.use: To buy garri and palm oil for his business

loans.name: Emelina

texts.en: Emelina is 33 years old, married, and has one child. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business selling dry goods in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more inventory to sell. Emelina has borrowed and paid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her business for six years and also earns an income from raising livestock. Emelina aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more inventory

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Nida works hard to support her family.  She has a food vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising livestock.  

Nida is requesting a loan for 15,000 PHP through NWTF, which she will use to purchase more ingredients for her food vending business. She has been sustaining her business activities through the past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for her food selling business.

loans.name: Wendy Patricia

texts.es:
Wendy Patricia, tiene 34 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos con edades de 8 y 12 años de edad,quienes estan estudiando y  vive en Cuyamel, Cortes.
Wendy lleva 4 años de tener su propio negocio donde vende variedad de productos, ofrece ropa como camisas, pantalones y ropa interior, también fajas, juguetes, recuerdos y artículos escolares.
Su negocio lo mantiene abierto desde las 8:30 hasta las 5:00 p.m. 
Ella trabajaba como secretaria en una empresa privada y con el fin de asegurar el futuro de sus hijos y dedicarles  más tiempo, inicio este negocio con sus propios ahorros.
La necesidad de mantener surtido decidió solicitar prestamos, ahora esta solicitando el tercer préstamo para comprar artículos escolares ya que viene la temporada escolar en las escuelas y colegios públicos y privados y va aprovechar incrementar las ventas.
Su meta es llegar a tener su propio local porque actualmente alquila y seguir manteniendo surtido el negocio.
texts.en:
Wendy Patricia, 34, is a single mother of two children who are 8 and 12 years old and who are attending school; she lives in Cuyamel, Cortes.  Wendy has had her own business for four years selling a variety of products.  She sells clothes like shirts, pants and underwear and also girdles, toys, keepsakes and school supplies.  Her store is open from 8:30 until 5pm.

She used to work as a secretary at a private firm but in order to assure her children’s future and to be able to spend more time with them she started this business with her own savings.  Needing to keep it well-stocked, she decided to ask for loans.  She’s now asking for her third loan to buy school supplies since the school term is about to start at public and private elementary and secondary schools and she wants to avail herself of increased sales.  Her goal is to have her own locale because she currently rents and to continue to have her store well-stocked.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for the store.

loans.name: Maria Sebastiana

texts.es:
Doña Maria Sebastiana tiene 42 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos de 15 y 17 años de edad, y vive en la colonia Miguel Paz Barahona, Cofradía, Cortes.
Maria  se dedica  a su propio  negocio de pulpería, el cual pudo establecer con fondos propios hace 6 años con la ayuda de su esposo. Ella vende productos de la canasta básica como harina, arroz, frijoles, maseca, manteca, etc. EL Negocio le genera buenas ganancias con las cuales reinvierte en la compra de mas producto. Le dedica a la pulpería  todo el día empezando desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde.
Doña Maria ha solicitado un préstamos de 10,000 lempiras, que invertirá en la compra de lácteos, carnes, embutidos, refrescos etc. Y así ofrecer variedad de productos comestibles a los clientes y su negocio le genere más ganancias. 
Tiene como meta  seguir trabajando para ayudar al sustento de su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Sebastiana, 42, is married and has two children who are 15 and 17 years old; she lives in Colonia Miguel Paz Barahona in Cofradía, Cortes.  
María has a business of her own: a grocery store that she was able to set up with her own funds six years ago with help from her husband.  

She sells basic staple items like flour, rice, beans, corn flour, lard, etc.  The store generates good profits that she reinvests to buy more products.  She spends all day in the grocery store starting at 7 in the morning and going until 5 in the afternoon.

María has requested a 10,000 lempira loan to buy dairy products, meats, cured meats, soft-drinks, etc. to offer a wider variety of foodstuffs to her customers so that the store will generate more profits.  Her goal is to stay in business to help support her family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, cured meats, meats, soft-drinks, etc.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio, de 44 años es un hombre que siempre le gusto hacerle frente a las circunstancias que se le presntan, es así como pudo salir adelante junto a Ruth de 29 años quien es su conviviente y con quien tiene tres menores hijos, Carol de 14, Shesira de 12 y Abel de 4 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. Julio, a diario se va al puerto de la ciudad en busca de comprar algunos productos que ofrece a sus clientes, a parir de las 4 de la madrugada llega al puerto y ahí espera pacientemente la llegada de los agricultores. Cuadno llega al embarcación, logra comprar, sus productos preferidos como el arroz, la yuca, el maíz, productos que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado. Durante cinco años lleva haciendo esta actividad el cual le ha permitido tener la tranquilidad de satisfacer algunas necesidades de su familia. Siempre trabajó solo y en algunas ocasiones tuvo la ayuda de su conviviente, agradece que las cosas le están yendo muy bien ya que tiene buenos clientes que a diario lo buscan por la calidad de productos que ofrece. Espera seguir trabajando de esta manera y mas adelante montar una tienda en donde ofrecer de manera mas tranquila sus productos. Este será el sexto préstamo con la institución MFP, por lo que esta muy entusiasmado de tener un apoyo para seguir trabajando y aumentar su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará productos para continuar con su negocio y atender bien a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Julio is 44 years old. He is a man that always likes to face the circumstances that are in front of him head on, and in this way he has been able to get ahead. He lives with his partner, Ruth, who is 29 years old, and with whom he has three children: Carol, who is 14 years old, Shesira, who is 12 years old and Abel who is 4 years old. They all live together in the home they own.   

On a daily basis Julio goes to the port of the city to look for products to buy, to resell to his customers. He arrives at the port at 4 a.m. and waits patiently for the farmers to arrive. When the boats arrive he buys the products he prefers like rice, yucca and corn, which all have high demand in the market. For the past five years he has done this activity, which has allowed him to be confident in meeting the needs of his family. He always works alone and on a few occasions has had the help of his partner. He is thankful that things are going very well and that he has good customers that come to him daily because of the high quality of products he offers. He hopes to continue working in this way and in the future open his own store to sell his products from, in a more calm manner. 

This will be his sixth loan with the institution of MFP. He is eager to have the support that allows him to continue working and increase his working capital. With the money he is requesting of 3000 soles, he is going to buy products to continue his business and serve his customers well.

loans.use: to buy more products like rice, yucca and corn.

loans.name: Valijon

texts.ru: Валичон житель города Турсунзаде. Возраст, 20 лет. Он холост. Живет вместе с родителями. Его отец находится в России. Валичон уже год как занимается животноводством. Он откармливает и продает скот. Кредит берет для закупа коровы.
texts.en: Valijon lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. He is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents. His father is currently in Russia. Valijon has been engaged in animal farming for a year. He fattens and sells cattle. He is taking this loan to purchase a cow.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Sirojiddin

texts.ru: Сирожиддин проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 26 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Сирожиддин более шести лет занимается животноводством. Он в основном откармливает и продает крупнорогатый скот. Кредит берет для закупа овец.
texts.en: Sirojiddin lives in the Shahrituz region. He is 26 years old, married, and has two children. Sirojiddin has been an animal farmer for over six years. Mainly, he raises and sells cattle. He is taking this loan to purchase sheep.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Jumanazar

texts.ru: Чуманазар 38 – летний женатый мужчина. У него семеро детей. Его братья работают в Российской Федерации. Сам он у себя дома занимается животноводством. В этой области он два года. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Jumanazar is a 38 year-old married man.  He has seven children.  His brothers work in the Russian Federation.  Jumanazar is involved in animal husbandry at home.  He has been in this business for two years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
This is Rosario, 49, a resident of Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. Because she is single, she manages her household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.                             

Rosario operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, 5 pesos worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Rosario earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 Philippines pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 13,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She hopes to be able to expand soon. 

Rosario faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina tiene 36 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 8, 10,13 y 19 años de edad, todos sus hijos están estudiando, y vive con ellos en la Aldea San Isidro, Siguatepeque. 
Carolina tiene un negocio de Cable Satelital. Servicio que  ofrece a la comunidad donde vive, este negocio lo obtuvo hace 8 años con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, Llego a establecerlo haciendo estudio de mercado a la comunidad, ya que no había ninguna señal de televisión, y concluyo que esta actividad le seria  rentable. Eso la motivo a seguir adelante con sus ideas de negocio, Y es así como pudo obtenerlo y sacar sus hijos adelante. En el negocio invierte 8 horas diarias de su tiempo.
Con las ganancias obtenidas y la ayuda de préstamos ha podido mantener un nivel estable a su negocio, ya que por la buena señal que brinda a los clientes, tiene mas demanda en la comunidad. Actualmente solicita un préstamo de 11,000 lempiras, para poder invertir en el mantenimiento de  la empresa y equipos de antenas.
Su meta es expandirse a las aldeas mas cercanas que no cuentan con este servicio, y así lograr una mayor cobertura y crecimiento en su empresa, y seguir brindándoles a sus clientes un servicio excelente en señal y  generando mas ingresos para poder ofrecer a sus hijos  una mejor educación y mejor vida.
texts.en:
Carolina, 36, is a single mother of four children who are 8, 10, 13 and 19 year sold.  All of her children are attending school and she lives with them in Aldea San Isidro, Siguatepeque.

Carolina has a satellite cable television service, a service she offers to the community where she lives.  She obtained the business 8 years ago with much effort and work.  She came to setting it up after doing a market survey in the community since there was no television signal there and she concluded that this activity would be profitable.  This motivated her to continue forward with her business ideas and this is how she was able to get it and move her children forward.  She spends 8 hours per day at work.

With profits obtained and help from the loans she’s been able to maintain the level of her business because of the good signal she provides her customers; demand in the community has increased.  She’s currently requesting an 11,000 lempira loan to service her antenna equipment and maintain the firm.  Her goal is to expand into nearby villages that don’t have this service to attain wider coverage and growth for her firm to continue providing excellent service to her customers and generating more income to provide her children with a better education and a better life.

loans.use: to maintain her equipment and antenna systems.

loans.name: Grosmi Margoth

texts.es:
Grosmi Margoth, tiene 25 años de edad, es madre soltera tiene un hijo de dos años de edad, vive en aldea el Porvenir, Siguatepeque.
Ella desde muy joven aprendió a elaborar productos de alfarería con su madre y su familia. Y hace tres años que, Grosmi se independizo siguiendo la tradición familiar y estableció su propio negocio donde elabora y vende  figuras de todo tipo y pinturas en arcilla de barro. Trabaja todos los días dedicándole 8 horas diarias, tiene un sobrino quien le ayuda a la elaboración de los productos. Hace trabajos de encargos también.
Esta solicitando este préstamo para invertir en la compra de moldes, arcilla de barro y pinturas, para cumplir con los pedidos y mantener en existencia.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando para ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Grosmi Margoth, 25, is a single mother of a two-year-old son; she lives in the village of El Porvenir, Siguatepeque.  Since she was very young she learned how to make clay items with her mother and her family.  Three years ago Grosmi started working the family tradition independently and set up her own business where she makes and sells all sorts of clay items and paintings.  She works every day, 8 hours per day.  She has a nephew that helps her make the items.  She also does items to order.

She’s asking for this loan to buy molds, clay and paint to fill pending orders and to have stock available.  Her dream is to continue working to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy clay, molds and paint.

loans.name: Martha  Patricia

texts.es: La señora  Martha es una persona emprendedora y  responsable  la  cual  siempre  a  sentido  mucha  atracción  por  la  cocina, esto   le  permitió   iniciar  un negocio  de   venta  de  comida   rápida  como hamburguesas,  burritos   y nachos, ella  se  acerco  con  nosotros  por que  en este  momento  desea   realizar la  compra  de  materia  prima para  su negocio, ve  en  el crédito la posibilidad  de  seguir  brindado a  sus  clientes  el  excelente  servicio  y   buen  sazón  que  desde  siempre   la a  caracterizado, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado  para  la  realización de  su proyecto.
texts.en: Martha is an entrepreneurial and responsible woman. She has always enjoyed working in the kitchen, and for this reason she started a business of fast food sales, selling things like hamburgers, burritos and nachos. She approached us because she wants to buy raw materials needed for her business. She sees that the loan allows her the possibility to continue bringing to her customers excellent service and good flavor, which from the beginning she has been known for. She is thankful for the support that this project offers.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make food with.

loans.name: Ariungerel

texts.en: Now her service has more equipment than it did at the start, and she has had many permanent customers. Ariungerel is requesting a loan to purchase some more new equipment for the workshop renovation. It is very important to her business' improvement and further expansion, she believes.

loans.use: To purchase some more new equipment for the workshop renovation.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам проживает в районе Шахритус. Возраст, 62  года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его сын находится в Российской Федерации. Сам Рустам занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается пять лет. Целью получения кредита является закуп крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en:
Rustam lives in the Shahrituz region. He is 62 years old, married, and has five children. His son is currently in Russia. 

Rustam raises livestock. He has been doing this for five years. The purpose of this loan is to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Hafizabonu

texts.ru: Хафизабону проживает в городе Худжанд. Ей 36 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Хафизабону более 12 лет занимается изготовлением и торговлей мебели. Этим видом деятельности она занимается у себя дома. В продвижении ее деятельности ей помогает ее муж. Она берет кредит для закупа сырья.
texts.en: Hafizabonu lives in the city of Khujand.  She is 36 years old, married and has two children.  Hafizabonu has been involved in manufacturing and selling furniture for over 12 years.  She is involved in this business at home.  Her husband helps her with running this business.  Hafizabonu is requesting this loan to purchase raw materials.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials

loans.name: Zaffar

texts.ru: Заффар проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его дети маленькие. Заффар более 17 лет занимает выращиванием овощей. Он берет кредит для посева картошки.
texts.en: Zaffar lives in the Jilikul district.  He is 33 years old, married and has two children.  His children are small.  Zaffar has been involved in growing vegetables for over 17 years.  He is requesting this loan to sow potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Tojidin

texts.ru: Точидин житель района Джиликул. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него трое детей.  Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Точидин имеет среднее образование. Он занимается растениеводством. У него при доме имеется земельный участок, где он сеет пшеницу. Этим видом деятельности занимается 18 лет. Целью получения кредита является закуп минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Tojidin is a resident of the Jilikul district.  He is 34 years old, married and has three children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Tojidin has a secondary education.  He is involved in agriculture.  He has a land plot by his house, where he sows wheat.  He has been in this business for 18 years.  The goal of this loan is to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy ingredients needed for cooking food

loans.name: San Juan Group

texts.es:
El Grupo llamado San Juan, es de la ciudad de Asunción, está integrado por 12 mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras que se esfuerzan siempre al máximo para poder salir adelante. El comité se encuentra, en su 9no.ciclo. Podemos decir que el grupo es muy responsable,  y todas las integrantes tienen actividades independientes, pero también realizan actividades en conjunto para ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Berta, es modista, tiene su pequeño tallercito, equipado con todo lo que necesita para poder trabajar. Comenta que le va bien en su trabajo ya que siempre tiene pedidos de trabajos para hacer. Su meta es poder tener un taller más amplio y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, gomas y demás insumos para poder seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The San Juan group comes from the city of Asunción and is made up of 12 hard-working and striving women who are always working to improve their lives. The group is going through its ninth cycle. The group is very responsible. All its members run their independent businesses, but are also willing to work together when members need help. 

Berta is a seamstress and runs a shop that is small but has all she needs to work. She says that her work is going well and she always has orders to work on. Her goal is to have a larger shop and this way continue to grow. She will use the loan to buy thread, fabric, buttons, and other products to continue working and fulfilling her clients orders.

loans.use: purchase fabric, thread, buttons and other materials for seamstress shop.

loans.name: Virgen De Guadalupe Group

texts.es:
El comité “Virgen de Guadalupe” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de  Santaní. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de trabajar juntas para poder lograr un futuro mejor para su familia.
Maria es una mujer que se esfuerza mucho a diario, ella trabaja todos los días en el lavado de ropas. Comenta que es un trabajo muy sacrificado, pues requiere de mucho esfuerzo, pero pese a eso ella está orgullosa de lo que hace, pues es un trabajo digno y por sobre todo honesto.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de lavandinas, jabones en polvo, en pan y líquidos, suavizantes y demás insumos necesarios para que pueda seguir con su trabajo. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad de le da, al formar parte del programa.
texts.en:
The communal bank 'Virgen de Guadalupe' was formed by several neighbours from the city of Santaní. The members form a very united group who are capable of working together to achieve a better future for their families.

Maria is a woman who works hard every day in laundry. She mentions that it is a very selfless job; it requires a lot of hard work. Despite this she is proud of what she does as it is a decent job and above all, honest.

She is requesting a loan to buy bleach, soap powders, bars, and liquids, softeners and other supplies which are necessary to be able to continue with her work. She is grateful to the Fundación for the opportunity of being part of this program.

loans.use: to buy bleach, soap powders, bars, and liquids, softeners and other supplies.

loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte Group

texts.es:
17 mujeres de la ciudad de Paraguarí se han unido con el propósito de trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo poder ayudar a sus familias y de esa forma tener un estilo de vida distinto. Ellas actualmente se encuentran en el primer ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras, están aprendiendo a trabajar en equipo y a trabajar juntas.
Magdalena es costurera, ella comenta que trabaja en esto hace ya un buen tiempo. Comenta que ya tiene muy buena clientela debido a que sus trabajos son muy buenos y a bajo costo. Ella se define como una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, quien lucha por darle a su familia todo lo mejor del día a día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, gomas, cierres y demás insumos necesarios para poder seguir trabajando y haciendo los pedidos que tiene.
texts.en:
Seventeen women from the city of Paraguarí have come together with the purpose of working together and through this work to help their families and in this way to have a different lifestyle. They are currently in their first cycle of the program for women entrepreneurs, and they are learning to function as a team working together.

Magdalena is a seamstress. She says that she has been in this work for quite some time. She comments that she has very good customers because her work is very good at a low price. She is known as a hard working and enterprising woman who fights to give her family all the best from day to day.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy fabric, thread, elastic, zippers and other necessary supplies in order to continue working and fulfilling the orders that she has.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, zippers and other supplies

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
EL señor Efrain es un joven que vive en la ciudad de Ica, lugar caracterizado por la diversidad de productos agroindustriales que exporta a distintos países del mundo, ciudad que ha sido capaz de mejorar su economía en el transcurso de estos últimos años demostrándose a sí mismo ser una tierra de luchadores, es aquí donde Efrain vive y tiene su pequeño negocio.

Efrain es técnico de computadoras, es decir si alguna de estas presenta alguna deficiencia, él personalmente se encarga de encontrar el problema y desde luego mejorarla, tiene su pequeña empresa desde hace algunos años y ha mejorado progresivamente gracias a la dedicación que le ha brindado al trabajo. Fueron sus amigos los que les enseñaron sobre este negocio, es gracias a ellos que ahora Efrain tiene su pequeña empresa. 

Actualmente el también tiene otro empleo en el que se desempeña como operario, labor que realiza desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde, luego de este empleo se dedica únicamente a su pequeño negocio.
Efraín sabe que la cantidad de sus clientes se está incrementando por que los trata de manera muy amable y eso los incita a continuar visitando su establecimiento, claro que siempre ha demostrado calidad en la prestación de servicios que realiza.

Efrain agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que con su apoyo el podra comprar una nueva computadora, la que le ayudará a agilizar su trabajo, con la finalidad de atender mucho más rápido a sus clientes y facilitar su trabajo, con ello  mejorara su servicio para que sus clientes lo recomienden y así pueda hacerse más conocido y desde luego mejorar considerablemente sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y forjarse como un gran microempresario peruano.
texts.en:
Efraín is a young man living in Ica, a place noted for the variety of agro industrial products it exports to various countries worldwide.  It’s a city that has succeeded in improving its economy over the last few years proving itself as a land of fighters.  This is where Efraín lives and has his small business.

Efraín is a computer technician, that is to say, if a computer has some sort of deficiency he personally takes care of finding the problem and, of course, repairing it.  He has had a small firm for a few years that has been improving gradually thanks to the dedication he puts into the work.  His friends taught him this business and thanks to them Efraín now has his own small firm.

At present, he also has another job where he works as a salaried employee from 7am until 4pm and after this job he dedicates himself exclusively to his small business.

Efraín knows that the number of customers is increasing because he treats them kindly and that encourages them to continue visiting his establishment.  It goes without saying that he has always provided quality work and service.

Efraín is thinking about improving some of his equipment and improve much more so that his customers will recommend him and he can become better known and of course considerably improve his income so that he can improve his quality of life and become a great Peruvian micro businessman.

loans.use: to purchase a computer

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es:
Herminia de 60 años es una mujer muy trabajadora que genera ingresos a partir de su negocio,  mediante el cual vende  productos,  que promociona a través de guidas especializadas o  revistas; entre las líneas de que ofrece   están los perfumes, sobrecamas, artículos para el  hogar y variedades en general, mediante la modalidad de crédito principalmente, pactado en plazos ajustados a necesidades comunes de sus clientes y de su negocio. Su miscelánea  está ubicada en su propia casa, localizada al sur de la ciudad, en un barrio que combina espacios productivos formales e informales, grandes superficies, locaciones deportivas, como el Estadio Metropolitano, donde se practica el buen futbol de Colombia y es llamado la casa de la Selección nacional de Futbol de Colombia. 
Herminia emprendió su aventura de negocio desde el año 1977, porque como mujer cabeza de hogar debió generar ingresos para salir adelante con sus dos hijos, hoy ya adultos.   Sus clientes principales son amigos, referidos y familiares, a quienes otorga  plazos que oscilan entre los 15 y 45 días y que le ayudan a responderle a la competencia con referidos, pues son los mejores voceros de su trabajo.  El negocio de Herminia  presenta   gastos operativos  relativamente bajos, sus gastos familiares los comparte con su hijo, quien es trabajador independiente; Herminia  maneja una recuperación de cuentas por cobrar acorde con el tipo de negocio que desarrolla, y tiene disciplina de inversión constante en su negocio,  lo que permitirá generar las utilidades suficientes para cubrir los gastos.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  para comprar ropa ajustada a la temporada de carnaval, perfumes, accesorios y variedades, para hacer una oferta que impacte a sus clientes, pues aprovechará una de las temporadas en la cual se incrementan las ventas, por el derroche de alegría y fiesta que genera el carnaval, con sus grupos folclóricos que participan en los  desfiles, donde toda la ciudadanía se volcará a las calles , a ver pasar la batalla de flores y otras actividades populares propias de esta fiesta.
texts.en:
Herminia, age 60, is a very hard-working woman who generates income through her business.  She sells products that are promoted through specialized guides or magazines.  These publications offer perfumes, bedspreads, household items, and a general assortment of products.  She sells mainly on credit in agreed upon payments that are adjusted to her customers’ common-needs and those of her business.

Her business of selling miscellaneous merchandise is in her house, which is to the south of the city.  It is in a neighborhood that combines formal and informal productive spaces, large stores, and sporting venues like the Estadio Metropolitano (Metropolitan Stadium) where good Colombian soccer is played.  It is called the National Selection House of Colombian Soccer.

Herminia undertook her business adventure in 1977.  She did this because, as a woman who is head of her household, she needed to generate income in order to get her two children ahead.  They are now adults.

Her main customers are friends, referred customers, and relatives.  She gives them payment installments of between 15 and 45 days.  They help her respond to the competition with references; they are the best spokespersons for her business.

Herminia’s business’s operating expenses are relatively low.  She shares the family expenses with her son, who works independently.  Hermninia handles a recovery of accounts receivables rate according to the type of business being conducted.  She has the discipline to constantly invest in her business.  This allows her to generate enough profit to cover the expenses.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domino.  She will use the loan to buy clothes for Carnival season, perfume, accessories, and a variety of products.  She will do this to make an offer that impacts her customers.  She will take advantage of the seasons when sales increase because of the joy and celebration that the Carnival generates with its folkloric groups that participate in parades.  All of the citizens pour into the streets to see the Battle of the Flowers parade and other popular activities during this fiesta.

loans.use: to buy clothes for Carnival, perfume, and accessories.

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de chicharroneria,ella vende chicharrones que es un plato a base de carne de chancho con papas,ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de chicharroneria.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne de chancho y papas al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This associate continues to work at her “chicharroneria” business. She sells “chicharron”, a dish that is made with pork rinds and potatoes. She works from 8am to 7pm. With this job, she is able to get ahead with her children. She’d like to expand and renovate her business. The associate is asking for a loan to buy wholesale cooking products like pork and potatoes. The associate is happy about her loan and promises to pay her installments.

loans.use: buy wholesale cooking products like pork and potatoes.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José es un hombre casado que tiene tres hijos en las edades de 10 a 13 años;  desde sus 19 años cuando terminó de estudiar su bachillerato, se dedicó a trabajar con un contratista y aprendió ha fabricar molduras de yeso, actividad en la que duró 10 años. A sus 23 años contrajo matrimonio y empezó a trabajar en empresas como ayudante de cocina y hoy en día trabaja como conserje en un edificio en la zona norte de la ciudad. Su capacidad de trabajo lo llevó a idearse, simultaneo a su trabajo en el edificio,  un negocio, para obtener mayores ingresos y  satisfacer las necesidades de bienestar en su hogar. En su negocio vende electrodomésticos menores, calzados, ropa y todo lo que sus clientes le encargan, su principal clientela se encuentra justamente en el lugar donde labora y alrededor de su vivienda. Actualmente está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará abanicos, televisores, ropa y calzado que tiene encargado, pues sus clientes están aprovechando las primas y bonificaciones para hacer gastos extras y tener a su familia muy satisfecha,  con los artículos y vestuario que le compran a José,  para recibir unidos el año nuevo.
texts.en:
José is a married man who has three children between the ages of 10 and 13. After he got his high school diploma at 19 years old, he began working as a contractor and learned how to make plaster molds, a job which he had for 10 years.  At 23 years old he got married and began working for companies as a kitchen assistant, and right now he works as a concierge in a building in the northern part of the city.  

While he was at his job in the building, his ability to work got him to start thinking up an idea for a business, so that he could get more income and help provide for the wellbeing of his household. 

Right now he is apply for a loan from Kiva, the first the one he has done through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, and with which he will buy fans, television sets, clothing and shoes. Their customers are taking advantage of the premiums and bonds for their extra costs and to keep their families happy. With the items and clothing that they will buy for José, they will greet the new year together.

loans.use: to buy fans, television sets, clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Regina

texts.es:
Regina forma parte del Banco comunal “El Sol de la Esperanza” perteneciente a la comuna de Puente Alto, ubicada en la ciudad de Santiago.
Ella se dedica a vender yerbas medicinales, cremas de belleza. Todos sus productos los vende en un puesto que tiene en la feria, se dedica a éste rubro desde hace 10 años.
Trabaja de martes a domingo en horarios de 8ºº de la mañana hasta las 16ºº horas de la tarde.
Su mercadería la compra en centros comerciales, donde los precios de compra sean convenientes económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará mercadería para surtir su negocio.
Una de sus metas es arrendar un local establecido para ofrecer sus productos con una mayor comodidad, ya que actualmente debe cargar y descargar su mercadería en la feria y trasladarla en un furgón.
Regina vive junto a su hijo de 30 años de edad, quien la ayuda en el traslado de su mercadería desde su casa hasta la feria y viceversa, ya que conduce el furgón. Además su hijo trabaja en la feria reparando y vendiendo accesorios para celulares en un puesto colindante al suyo.
Comenta que uno de sus sueños es salir de vacaciones.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto a las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones del Banco comunal, ha aprendido a administrar su negocio. Y el grupo del Banco comunal del cual forma parte es muy bueno.
Puente Alto es una comuna ubicada al norte de Santiago, capital de Chile. Fue fundada como un pequeño pueblo rural a fines del siglo XIX, pero dado su crecimiento demográfico es actualmente una de las comunas con mayor población de Chile, superando los 600 mil habitantes. Es la puerta de entrada a uno de los sectores precordilleranos de la región Metropolitana, conocido como el Cajón del Maipo, sector con espacios de caminatas, cabalgatas, rafting, entre otras actividades y servicios de alojamiento y alimentación.
texts.en: Regina is a member of the Communal Bank, “El Sol de Esperanza” in the community of Puente Alto in the city of Santiago. She sells medicinal herbs and beauty products. She sells all of her products in a booth she has at the fair. She’s been doing this for 10 years. She works from Tuesday to Sunday from 8am to 4pm. She buys her products in shopping malls where the prices are economical. With the loan, she will buy inventory to stock her business. One of her goals is to rent an established locale where it will be more convenient for her, since she must load and unload her merchandise at the fair and transport it by van. Regina lives with her 30 year old son, who helps her transport the merchandise from her house to the fair and vice versa, as he’s the one who drives the van. Her son also works at the fair, repairing and selling cell phone accessories in a booth adjacent to hers. She says that one of her dreams is to go on vacation. She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity provided to her by Fondo Esperanza, as it will help her invest in her business. By way of the training imparted in the meetings at the Communal bank, she has learned how to administer her business. The Communal bank, of which she is a member, is very good. Puente Alto is a community located to the north of the Chilean capital, Santiago. It was founded as a small rural town at the end of the XIX century, but because of its demographic growth, it is actually one of the communities with the biggest population in Chile, at more than 600 thousand inhabitants. It’s the doorway into one of the pre-Andean mountain ranges of the Metropolitan region, known as the “Cajón del Maipo” and is an area with hiking trails, horse riding, rafting, as well as other activities, and room and board services.

loans.use: buy inventory to stock her business.

loans.name: Bersella

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de chicharroneria,ella preparar chicharron que es un plato a base de chancho frito y papas fritas,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de chicharroneria.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar carne de chancho y papas al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The borrower continues to work in her “chicharronería;” she makes “chicharrones” which is a dish based on pork and fried potatoes.  She’s able to support her son through this business.  Her dream is to expand and improve the chicharronería.  She’s asking for a loan to buy pork and potatoes at wholesale.  She’s happy about the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy pork and potatoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de chicharroneria,el tiene un restaurant donde vende chicharrones que es un plato a base de carne de chancho con papas fritas,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este tranajo el socio saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño del socio es ampliar le negocio de chicharroenria.El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne de chancho y papas al por mayor.
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The borrower continues to work in his “chicharronería;” he has a restaurant where he sells “chicharrones” which is a dish based on pork and fried potatoes.  He works from 8am until 6pm and is able to support his children through this work.  His dream is to expand the chicharronería.  He’s asking for a loan to buy ingredients to cook like pork and potatoes at wholesale.  He’s happy about the loan and committed to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to cook.

loans.name: Marifat

texts.ru: Маърифат жительница района Дангары. Ей 38 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Двое ее детей учатся в школе, а третий маленький. Сама она имеет высшее педагогическое образование. По профессии она работает 16 лет. Кроме того она у себя дома разводит скот. Она в основном закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Marifat is a resident of the Dangara district.  She is 38 years old, married and has three children.  Two of her children attend school, and the third is still small.  Marifat has a higher, pedagogical education.  She has been working in her field for 16 years.  Besides this, she breeds livestock at home.  Marifat primarily buys livestock for future sale.  She is requesting this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Hikoyat

texts.ru: Хикоят жительница района Дангары. Она замужем. Ей 62 года. У нее шестеро детей. Ее дети живут отдельно. Сама Хикоят имеет среднее образование. Она более шести лет занимается животноводством. В основном она откармливает и продает скот. В этом ей помогает ее муж. Она берет кредит для закупа дойной коровы с целью увеличения количества скота.
texts.en: Hikoyat lives in the region of Dangara. She is married. She is 62 years old. She has six children. Her children live separately. Hikoyat has secondary education. She has been raising livestock for over six years. She mainly fattens cattle for resale. Her husband helps her in this work. She is taking out a loan in order to buy a dairy cow and increase her livestock.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Lechuguitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LECHUGUITAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Evelin. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: elaboración de moldes, venta de verduras, macramé de mantas, venta de ropa interior y queques, venta de carne de oveja, elaboración de papas fritas, elaboración y venta de sombreros.

La señora Evelin,  indica que es la primera vez que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta de sombreros que viene trabajando hace años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de sombreros) que comprará la Ceja  y posteriormente lo venderá en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella tiene un hijo y vive en unión libre.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The “Lechugitas” communal association will begin their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer.  The group is part of the Collpani regional office, and is made up of eight members, who are managed by a board that is headed by Evelin.  The members of the group are involved in various types of businesses, including making patterns for clothing, selling vegetables, weaving blankets, selling undergarments and cakes, selling lamb meat, making potato chips, and making and selling hats.

Evelin says that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer, and that she joined the organization after a friend invited her.  Her current business is making and selling hats, which she has done for years.

She is going to use the loan to increase her capital by purchasing additional hats, which she will buy in the Ceja neighborhood of El Alto and then sell at her stand.  This type of work allows her to earn the resources she needs to support her family.  She has one child and lives in a common-law marriage. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Evelin said she likes the training the organization provides.

loans.use: to purchase hats to sell.

loans.name: Rosa  Maria

texts.es:
La socia anteriormente se estaba dedicando al negocio de hostal,pero no le fue muy bien ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de chicharoneria que es un restaurant donde venden chicharrones que es un plato base de chancho frito con papas fritas,la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el local de chicharroneria.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar carne de chancho y papas al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The associate used to run a hostal, but it didn’t go very well for her, so now she has a “chicharroneria” business. This is a restaurant where she sells “chicharron”, a dish made of fried pork rinds and fried potatoes. The associate works from 9am to 6pm. With this job, she is able to get ahead with her children. Her dream is to expand the restaurant. The associate is asking for the loan to buy wholesale pork and potatoes. The associate is happy about the loan and promises to pay her installments.

loans.use: buy wholesale pork and potatoes.

loans.name: Jairo Manuel

texts.es: Jairo es propietario junto con su esposa de un restaurante en el corregimiento de Juan Mina, muy cerca a la ciudad de Barranquilla; su negocio está ubicado en la vía principal, allí vende a crédito almuerzos, desayunos, especialmente a empleados de empresas del sector, quienes  le pagan semanal y quincenalmente; en su negocio labora junto a su esposa y dos empleado mas, de  lunes a sábado y el domingo venden comidas rápidas , refrescos  y cervezas, con el restaurante obtienen los principales ingresos del hogar formado por su esposa y  sus dos niños en las edades de 9 y 13 respectivamente.  Con sus ingresos por efectos de las  ventas, cubre sus costos y gastos operativos, los gastos familiares y, quedándole una muy buena capacidad de pago, razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, pues desea invertir en víveres e insumos para su restaurante, el cual comprará en mayor volumen y con ello ganará descuentos por su compra de contado; en su negocio  tiene un buen número de activos fijos que le permiten prestar un muy buen servicio a sus clientes y una capacidad de servicio que potencializa el crecimiento de su negocio, además de su buena ubicación, sus activos corrientes están  representado en sus cuentas por cobrar, que recupera quincenalmente, debido a la forma de pago de sus clientes.
texts.en: Jairo is the owner of a restaurant along with his wife. It’s located in the village of Juan Mina, very close to the city of Barranquilla. His business is located on the main street. There he sells lunches and breakfasts on credit, especially to employees in the area’s factories who pay him weekly and biweekly. He works together with his wife and two more employees in his business. They sell fast food, drinks, and beers from Monday to Saturday and Sunday. Through the restaurant, he and his wife get the main household income to support his wife and their two children who are 9 and 13 years old, respectively. With sales income, he covers the operation costs and expenses and household costs, leaving him with a very good ability to pay which is why he’s come to Kiva. He wants to invest in food and ingredients for the restaurant which he will buy in bulk getting discounts for his cash purchases. The business has many fixed assets which allows him to provide good customer service as well as a service capacity that allows the potential for business growth. Along with his good location, his current assets are represented in his accounts receivable which he receives biweekly in the form of customer payments.

loans.use: to invest in food and ingredients for his business.

loans.name: Sandy Jessica

texts.es:
Sandy es una mujer de 30 años que se considera muy joven y está segura que aún puede lograr estudiar y concluir una carrera técnica con la finalidad de desarrollarse profesionalmente y sentirse muy orgullosa de sí misma, también está muy deseosa de hacerlo porque es consciente que sólo así mejorará su pequeña bodega, ofreciendo una mejorar calidad de atención a sus clientes, realizar mejores compras y todo lo que los estudios puedan ayudarla a mejorar.

Ella tiene una pequeña y ambas viven solas debido a que su esposo decidió marcharse, a pesar del dolor que sufrió esta familia, Sandy estaba decidida a salir adelante, ella sabía que su pequeña y su futuro dependían de ella, actualmente está muy contenta por la mejora constante en su negocio y está orgullosa de ser como es.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Sandy logrará comprar más productos como leche, bebidas gasificadas, atún, productos de limpieza, entre otros. Sandy quiere mejorar el nivel de sus venta para que su pequeña familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y se desarrolle como una gran microempresaria.
texts.en:
Sandy is a 30-year-old woman who considers herself to be very young and sure that she can still manage to study a technical career with the goal of developing professionally and feeling proud of herself.  She also wants to do it because she’s aware that this is the only way she will improve her small store offering better customer service to her customers and buying better products, everything schooling can help her improve.

She has a little girl and they both live alone because her husband decided to leave.  Despite the pain this family suffered, Sandy was determined to continue forward.  She knew that her little girl and her future depended on her.  She is very happy at present with the constant improvement in her store and she’s proud of being the way she is.

With help from Kiva lenders Sandy will manage to buy more products like milk, carbonated beverages, tuna and cleaning supplies, among others.  Sandy wants to improve her sales level so that her small family will have a better quality of life and so that she can develop as a great micro businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: La Rica Vicky - Chupaca Group

texts.es:
El Señora HILDA AYDE 54 años de edad estado civil casada, con 01 hija menor de edad. Es socio de la  alcancía comunal “LA RICA VICKY - CHUPACA”.
Ella actualmente tiene Biohuertos Ecológicos se dedica a la plantaciones y producción de flores como rosales, margaritas, lirio, anís, romero, etc. El préstamo solicito para la compra de plantas injertas y silvestres o diversas plantas una vez reproducidas las plantas las  vende en el mercado de su localidad. Dando la  oportunidad para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
Desea en el futuro comprar su casa. En la fotografía está ubicado la tercera persona lado derecha que viste con pantalón color negro, polo color rosada, chompa color negro, se encuentra ha lado del joven José Manuel.
texts.en:
Hilda Ayde, 54, is married and has a minor daughter.  She’s a member of the “La Rica Vicky-Chupaca” communal bank.  She has ecological orchards where she grows flowers like roses, daisy, lilies, anise, rosemary, etc.  

She requested the loan to buy grafted, wild and various plants.  Once the plants reproduce she sells them in the local market thus improving opportunities for income.  She wants to buy a house in the future.


In the photo, she’s third from the right and is wearing black pants, pink shirt and a black jacket; she’s next to José Manuel.

loans.use: to buy plants.

loans.name: Nurbi

texts.ru: Нурби проживает в районе Дангара. Ей 40 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Она занимается животноводством. В основном она закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Nurbi lives in the Dangara district.  She is 40 years old, married and has five children.  She is involved in animal husbandry.  Nurbi primarily buys livestock for subsequent sale.  She is requesting this loan to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Khushkadam

texts.ru: Хушкадам проживает в районе Хамадони. Возраст, 28 лет. Женат. Имеет одного ребенка. Хушкадам более пяти лет занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Он берет кредит для посева пшеницы.
texts.en: Khushkadam lives in the Hamadoni district.  He is 28 years old, married and has one child.  Khushkadam has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over five years.  He is requesting this loan to sow wheat.

loans.use: to sow wheat

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: Фарход житель района Хамадони. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его сын занимается бизнесом в городе Душанбе. Сам он занимается выращиванием овощей. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа топлива для трактора.
texts.en: Farhod is a resident of the Hamadoni district.  He is 46 years old, married and has four children.  His son is involved in business in the city of Dushanbe.  Farhod is involved in growing vegetables.  He has been in this business for five years.  He is requesting this loan to buy fuel for a tractor.

loans.use: to buy fuel

loans.name: Nadramia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nadramia; ella tiene 25 años de edad, conviviente  y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias ejerciendo su carrera de  técnica en farmacia ella cuenta con su botica donde vende diferentes jarabes, pastillas, lociones, perfumes, pañales entre otros, la socia lleva un año en este negocio el cual le va bien, a la vez la socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas y luego los vende  a sus clientes que le solicitan.

La socia en esta oportunidad desea el crédito para comprar más medicamentos para su botica como la compra de pastillas y jarabes.

La socia se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate is a member of the Communal Bank ”CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”; the bank is located in the Chinchero district in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco. The associate is Mrs. Nadramia; she is 25 years old, lives with her partner and has a son. The associate alternates her daily activities between two jobs. She studied to be a pharmacy technician and has a pharmacy where she sells different syrups, pills, lotions, perfumes, and diapers, to name a few. She’s been doing this for 1 year and it’s been going well. At the same time, she raises small animals like guinea pigs and chickens and then sells them to clients who ask for them.
The associate, at this time, is asking for the loan to buy more medications for her pharmacy, like pills and syrups.
The associate promises to pay the installments of her loan.

loans.use: buy more medications for her pharmacy, like pills and syrups.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase beers and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Ziyo

texts.ru: Зиё житель района Рудаки. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Зиё занимается животноводством. Он в основном откармливает и продает скот. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Ziyo is a resident of the Rudaki district.  He is 50 years old, married and has six children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Ziyo is involved in animal husbandry.  He primarily fattens up and sells livestock.  Ziyo is requesting this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru: Сафарали проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Сафарали имеет средне - техническое образование, он агроном. По специальности он работает уже два года. Кроме того он занимается животноводством. Кредит берет для закупа двух бычков.
texts.en: Safarali lives in the Dangara district.  He is 48 years old, married and has seven children.  Safarali has a secondary-technical education as an agronomist.  He has been working in his field for two years.  Besides this, he is involved in animal husbandry.  Safarali is requesting this loan to buy two bulls.

loans.use: to buy two bulls

loans.name: Akobir

texts.ru: Акобир проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его дети маленькие. Акобир имеет среднее образование. Он рядом с домом открыл продуктовый магазин, где работает продавцом. В этой области он 7 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения холодильника и покупки молочных изделий.
texts.en: Akobir lives in the Dangara district.  He is 33 years old, married and has two children.  His children are small.  Akobir has a secondary education.  He opened a food market near his house, where he works as a salesperson.  He has been in this business for seven years.  Akobir is requesting this loan to buy a refrigerator and dairy products.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and dairy products

loans.name: Mariatu

texts.en:
This is 39 year-old Mariatu. She is married and has 4 children ages 23, 20, 18, and 15 years. 

In 2002, Mariatu established a clothing business. She began her business in order to develop her home and it is her major source of livelihood. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she earns about 900,000 Sierra Leone leones every month from this business.

Mariatu would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. She has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy wax cotton and other clothing materials. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000.

In the future, Mariatu plans to send her daughter abroad, to own a house, and to have a larger business center. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy wax cotton and other clothing materials.

loans.name: Alexandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Alexandra es una mujer de 35 años, se caracteriza por ser una persona alegre, de caracter fuerte y muy responsable en su trabajo.Alexandra vive con su mamá y sus tres hijos en la ciudad de Ibarra en la Provincia de Ibarra.

Alexandra trabaja con una socia en una cafetería, vendiendo quimbolitos, humitas y tamales que son comidas tradicionales del Ecuador hechas a base de maíz tierno pueden ser de dulce o de sal, acompañado de un café o té de alguna plantita. Es el tercer crédito que realiza en Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de materia prima como maíz tierno, azúcar, sal, café y también unas mesas para recibir mejor a sus clientes. Esta inversión le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y clientes que le ayudarán a sustentar los gastos de su hogar y sus hijos debido a que es el único ingreso económico para su familia.

El sueño de Alexandra es poder construir el techo de la cafetería ya que solo atiende en las mesas con sombrillas.
texts.en:
Alexandra is a 35-year-old woman who is noted for being a cheerful person with a strong character and who is very responsible at work.  She lives with her mother and three children in the city of Ibarra in Ibarra Province.

Alexandra works as a partner in a coffee shop selling “quimbolitos” [sweet, steamed corn cakes], “humitas” [type of tamale] and tamales that are traditional Ecuadorean dishes made from tender corn; they can be sweet or savory and are usually served with coffee or herbal tea.

This is the third loan she’s taken with Fodemi and she will use it to buy raw materials like tender corn, sugar, salt and coffee and also some tables to better serve her customers.  This investment will allow her to increase sales and clientele which will help her cover household expenses and support her children since this is her only source of family income.  Alexandra’s dream is to be able to build a roof over her coffee shop since she currently is only taking care of customers at tables with umbrellas.

loans.use: to buy corn, sugar, coffee and some tables.

loans.name: Bendicion De Dios Group

texts.es: El Banco comunal Bendición de Dios está conformado por 10 emprendedores que son de las misma comunidad cada uno de ellos tiene sus propios negocios en  el cual se unieron para apoyarse y motivarse uno a otros. No es la primera vez que este grupo está solicitando crédito para invertir en sus negocios. Actualmente este grupo está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio y aumentar su inventario. Maria Mercedes que es parte de este grupo su negocio es la venta de recarga y variedad de refrescos, helados ella ha pasado muchos obstáculos en su vida pero sigue adelante,actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de recargas movistar y claro, bolsas, variedad de frutas, azucar, entre otros productos para la elaboracion de los refrescos.
texts.en:
The communal bank Bendición de Dios is made up of 10 entrepreneurs who are from the same community. Each one of them has his own business, and they are united to support one another and motivate each other. This isn’t the first time that this group has asked for a loan to invest in their businesses. Now this group is asking for funding to invest in the business. 

Maria Mercedes is part of this group, and her business is selling phone recharges and a variety of refreshments and ice cream. She has faced many obstacles in her life but she continues moving forward. She is asking for funding to buy phone recharges for Movistar and Claro, as well as bags, a variety of fruits, and sugar, among other products to be able to make her beverages.

loans.use: to buy phone recharges, as well as bags, fruit and sugar for making drinks.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: Evaristo, de 41 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Convive con Miriam, quien es comerciante, fruto de esa unión tiene dos hijos de 16 y 11 años de edad. Juntos habitan en su propia casa que construyeron con mucho esfuerzo. Las actividades que realiza Evaristo es la de agricultura ya que cuenta con un terreno ubicado a la altura del Km. 60 de la Carretera Federico Basadre donde tiene sembrado un extensión de cacao que saca a vender periódicamente en la ciudad de Lima, pues logra conseguir que le  paguen buenos precios. Ya lleva dedicándose a esta actividad cerca de 8 años contando con el apoyo de peones para la cosecha y mantenimiento de su terreno, a los que paga por jornada de trabajo. Paralelo a esta actividad también se dedica a la albañilería, logrando tener más conocimientos, siendo últimamente requerido por sus clientes. Le gusta sus actividades pues logra desenvolverse muy bien en ambas pues ha logrado aprender muy bien sus funcionamiento, además del ingreso económico que le genera, teniendo planes de adiestrase más en el rubro de albañilería y poder subir de categoría logrando un mejor ingreso económico. Este será el préstamo número 08 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de abonos y en el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de cacao, pagando peones, y con una parte en la compra de algunas herramientas de albañilería.
texts.en:
Evaristo, 41, is a hardworking, enterprising man who very much wants to get ahead.  He lives with Miriam who is a merchant; they have two children who are 16 and 11 years old.  They all live together in their own house that they built with much effort.  

Evaristo is a farmer; he has a field located at the height of kilometer 60 along the Federico Basadre Highway where he’s growing cocoa beans to sell periodically in the city of Lima because he gets good prices there.  Alongside this activity, he also works as a bricklayer learning more skills that are required by his customers lately.  He likes his activities because he’s able to develop well in both since he’s learned the tasks very well in addition to the good income they generate.  He plans to increase his bricklaying skills to continue rising in category thus earning better income.

This will be MFP loan #8 so he’s hoping for your collaboration so that he can continue toward his objectives.  He will use the requested 1000 new soles to buy manure for his cocoa bean crops and to pay day laborers; he will use part of it also to buy some bricklaying tools.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure, hire day laborers and buy work tools.

loans.name: Xenia

texts.es: Xenia, de 20 años, es una joven emprendedora, es soltera y no tiene hijos. A diario comparte su vida con su madre, sus abuelos y sus hermanos, viven juntos en una casa alquilada y juntos trabajan para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Desde muy joven Xenia siempre estuvo a lado de su madre en todo momento, observando y aprendiendo del negocio, que es la venta de comida, es así que cuando tuvo un pequeño capital decidió empezar un negocio por si misma.
