Merle runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines.  She has been running her store for 4 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.  Merle has requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell in her sari-sari store.

Merle has borrowed and repaid 9 loans from NWTF before this loan.  She  aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: buy stocks for her store

loans.name: Phoebe

texts.en:
Phoebe is 51 years old.  She is married and has seven children.  She works hard to provide for her family. 

Phoebe runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines.  She has been running this business for 5 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Phoebe has requested a 19,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.  She has borrowed and paid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan.   

Phoebe aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is 63 years old and is a widow with eight children.

Rita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines.   She has been running this business for 12 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.  

Rita has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell.   She has borrowed and repaid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan.  

Rita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 42 years old.  She is married and has four children.

Rosalinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a flower retail business in the Philippines.   She has been running this business for 11 years and also earns an income from a general store.  

Rosalinda has requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to purchase more flowers to sell.  She has borrowed and repaid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Rosalinda aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future for her family.

loans.use: buy flowers to sell

loans.name: Hope

texts.en:
Hope is a single woman who has one child.  She is 25 years old and resides in Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Hope owns and operates a retail business, providing (cell phone) e-loads to local members to earn a living.  She has been in this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP from her business. 

Hope has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional e-loader SIM cards for her business.  Hope joined GDMPC in the year 2011. In the future, she wants to build a house and to give a good future to her child.

loans.use: buy cell phone SIM cards

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a widow with eight children.  She is 57 years old and has children who are in school.  She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.  

Lolita has a food vending business in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Lolita has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is a 47-year-old widow with four children. With 2 children in school, Merlinda works very hard to provide for them.

Merlinda runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items such as coffee, milk, sugar, canned goods, soap, etc..  She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

In the future Merlinda would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: buy stocks for her store

loans.name: Shirin

texts.ru: Ширин проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Он имеет средне - специальное образование, технолог. По специальности работает 15 лет. Кроме того он у себя дома занимается птицеводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для закупа кур и цыплят.
texts.en: Shirin lives in the region of Dangara. He is 54 years old. He is married and has six children. He has a specialized secondary education, he is a technitian. He has worked in his profession for fifteen years. He is also in the business of poulty production at home. He has been in this business for two years. Shirin is taking out the loan to buy hens and chicks.

loans.use: to purchase hens and chicks.

loans.name: Rayakan

texts.ru: Раякан 52 года, вдова, имеет четверых детей, младшие школьники. С 1992 года, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Раякан начала свой бизнес в животноводстве. Благодаря упорству и настойчивости, на сегодняшний день,  ее хозяйство насчитывает одну дойную корову, две овцы, три козы и  приносит около 9,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Также Раякан занимается пошивом национальных изделий  «шырдак»  (войлочный коврик) и «тошок»  (шерстяное одеяло), приносящее доход в сумме около 4,000 сом (KGS) в месяц .  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Раякан обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коз. В будущем, Раякан хочет увеличить хозяйство и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Rayakan is 52 years old, she is a widow with four children, younger are students. Since 1992 while in search of a source of income for her family Rayakan started her business in breeding livestock. Because of her tenacity and perseverance today her business has one milk cow, two sheep, three goats and brings about 9,000 Som (KGS) per month from the sale of milk and dairy products. Rayakan is also engaged in tailoring national products like "shyrdak" (a felt mat) and "toshok" (blanket) yielding an income of about 4,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to further develop her business Rayakan has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy goats. In the future Rayakan wants to increase the livestock and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Khayrulo

texts.ru: Хайруло проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 42 года. Он занимается выращиванием овощей и посевом зерновых культур. Этим видом деятельности он занимается пять лет. Кроме того он сажает фруктовые деревья. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян картошки.
texts.en: Khayrulo lives in the Jilikul district.  He is 42 years old.  He is involved in growing vegetables and sowing cereal crops.  He has been in this business for five years.  Besides this, he grows fruit trees.  Khayrulo is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and potato seeds.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and potato seeds

loans.name: Rajabali

texts.ru: Рачабали проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 23 года. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Рачабали занимается растениеводством. В этой области он 7 лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Rajabali lives in the Jilikul district.  He is 23 years old, married and has one child.  Rajabali is involved in agriculture.  He has been in this business for seven years.  He is requesting this loan to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 61 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Mercy buys and sells dry goods in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan, through NWTF, to purchase more items to sell in her business.

Mercy has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items, such as bags, shoes, t-shirts, pants, etc.

In the future, Mercy would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more items to sell in her business

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 53 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Rosemarie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan, through NWTF, to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Rosemarie has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items, such as sugar, milk, canned goods, noodles, eggs, soft drinks, snack foods, etc. 

In the future, Rosemarie would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Maris Stella

texts.en:
Maris Stella is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 25 years old, married and has two children. 

She owns and operates a specialized retail store, selling daily-use products to the local community. She has been engaged in this business for six years and earns 10,000 PHP a month. 

In 2008, Maris Stella joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Maris Stella is requesting a new loan of 35,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items in order to expand her product offering. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase new items in order to expand her product offering

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Tsetsegmaa

texts.en:
Mrs. Tsetsegmaa, 53, is retired and lives with her husband in Kherlen, a boundary town in western Mongolia. 

She used to work as a military woman and retired three years ago. She owns an old house, which was built in the early 1970s and now she wants to make some adjustments to her old and uncomfortable house to live in. 
It needs some necessary building materials for wall insulation and to change the roof. The loan she is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the building materials required for house repair and to covering the cost of hired workers.

loans.use: To purchase the building materials required for house repair and to cover the cost of hired workers.

loans.name: Jessa

texts.en:
Jessa is a married woman and has three children. She is 21 years old and resides in Tabuan, Tukuran Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. 

Jessa owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living and she's been in this business for two years. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of work. 

She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase new items in order to expand her product offering. In 2011, Jessa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. 

In the future, Jessa wants to build a house and finish her children's studies.

loans.use: to purchase new items in order to expand her product offering

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is a married woman and has six children. She is 47 years old and resides in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. 

Estrella operates a fishing business venture, selling seafood products, including crabs and shrimp to the local community to earn a living and she's been in this business for two years. 

Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of work. She requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fishing equipment, including hooks and nets. This year, Estrella joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. 

In the future, Estrella hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment, including hooks and nets

loans.name: Muhriddin

texts.ru: Мухриддин активный и трудолюбивый молодой человек. Более 11 лету него свой игровой компьютерный центр, где ведет свою деятельность. Он предоставляет компьютерные игры. У него много посетителей, потому что он всегда записывает новые интересные компьютерные игры. Мухриддин хотел бы получить займ для покупки основных средств с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Muhriddin is an active and hardworking young man. He has owned a gaming computer center for more than 11 years, where he runs his business. He offers computer games. He has many visitors, because he always provides new, interesting computer games.

Muhriddin would like to receive a loan for the purchase of equipment, with aim to expand his business. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase computer equipment

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru: Илхом женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Илхом работает в Микро заемной организаций на  должности  кредитного менеджера. Кроме того он имеет свой бизнес.  Более двух лет он занимается этим бизнесом и торгует в выходные дни.В другие дни помогает жена. Его магазин находится рядом с домом. Он продает женскую и детскую одежду. Илхом хотел бы получить займ для покупки нового ассортимента одежды. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Ilhom is married and the responsible father of two children. Ilhom works at a micro lending organization in the position of credit manager. In addition to this, he owns his own business. He has been in this business for more than two years, trading on the weekend. On the other days he helps his wife. 

Ilhom's store is located next to his house. He sells women's and children's clothing. Ilhom would like to receive a loan for the purchase of a new range of clothing. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy new merchandise

loans.name: Mbana

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée. Elle est mère de trois enfants dont deux vont à l'école.Pour pouvoir satisfaire ses besoins et aider son mari à entretenir les enfants , elle mène un commerce de tissus. Elle s'approvisionne dans un pays limitrophe à bon prix et revend ses tissus à crédit à des clients habitants sa localité.Les produits tirés de ce commerce servent essentiellement aux dépenses alimentaires, sanitaires et d'habillement.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 250000f pour d'acheter 5 rouleaux de tissus gambien.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married woman and the mother of three children, out of whom two attend school. In order to provide for herself and help her husband to support the children, she sells fabrics.

She gets her supplies at a good price in a neighboring country, and resell her fabrics on credit, to customers from her place of residence.

The profits drawn from her business are mainly used to cover food, health care and clothing expenses.

In order to bolster he working capital, she's seeking a loan of XOF 250'000 to buy five rolls of Gambian fabrics. Her ambition is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy five rolls of Gambian fabrics

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is from San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 47 years old, married and has three children. 

To make a living, she owns and operates a business venture, making and selling snacks to the local community. She has been engaged in her business for 13 years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month from this activity. 

In 2008, Nenita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Nenita is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase more snack foods to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family

loans.use: to purchase more snack foods to sell

loans.name: Siny

texts.fr: Madame Siny est une femme divorcée de 27 ans qui habite au Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce  plus précisément  dans la vente d’habits, de chaussures, de jus locaux et de divers autres produits  nouveaux qui apparaissent sur le marché. Elle a choisi cette activité pour lutter  contre l’oisiveté et se procurer des gains qui lui permettront de subvenir  a ses  propres besoins. Elle est surtout intéressée par l’aspect lucratif de l’activité. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis février 2004. Elle a déjà remboursé 7 prêts  antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour  l’achat de draps, de fruits de mer, d’huile de palme et du karité qu’elle va revendre.  Elle souhaite diversifier  les produits qu’elle commercialise. Les crédits qui lui sont octroyés sont d’un grand apport pour elle car ca lui a permis de se payer un réfrigérateur qui lui permet d’exercer son activité de vente de jus et de glace.
texts.en: Siny is a 27-year old woman who is divorced and lives in Senegal. She is a trader and in particular sells clothes, shoes, local juices and various other new products which appear on the market. She chose this activity in order not to remain idle and to make some money to provide for her own needs. She is above all interested in the lucrative aspect of the activity. She has been a member of one of the branches of UIMCEC since February 2004 and has already repaid seven previous loans. She is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs to buy sheets, sea food, palm oil and shea oil, which she will then resell. She would like to diversify the products she sells. The loans she is granted consititute a significant financial aid for her since they have allowed her to buy a refrigeratoir which enables her to sell juice and ice-cream.

loans.use: to buy sheets, sea food, palm oil and shea butter for resale

loans.name: Munhktuya

texts.en:
Mrs. Munkhtuya, 25, sells diary products, such as cow's milk and yogurt in the market at Kherlen, a boundary town in western Mongolia. 

She has been running her business for over five years. She lives with her husband and her son in the common, which is located in a suburban district.

She already has her own permanent customers and they say that they have no doubt in her sales, she always sells us the best diary products. 

Munkhtuya is taking a loan to increase her working capital to expand the business. It is beneficial for her business future. The loan she is taking will be dedicated to the purchase of larger amounts of diary products.

loans.use: To purchase larger amounts of diary products.

loans.name: Sope Mohamed Group

texts.fr: "SOPE MOHAMED " est un groupe de cinq femmes organisées en tontine.Elles se réunissent une fois par semaine, se cotisent et remettent l'argent à l'une des membres pour l'appuyer dans ses activités.Elles sont toutes mariées.Elles exercent dans le commerce de produits cosmétiques.Cette activité leur permet de subvenir à leurs besoins mais aussi d'appuyer leurs maris dans la prise en charge des dépenses d'entretien de la famille.Le chef du groupe ( main tendue) est mère de deux enfants.Elle a ouvert une cantine devant son domicile et y expose ses produits.Pour renforcer leur fonds de commerce, le groupe sollicite un prêt de 250 000f afin d'acheter 5 cartons de ruban et de popeline.Leur ambition est de renforcer leur commerce.
texts.en: Sope Mohamed Group is made up of five women who are part of a tontine, a revolving credit association. They get together once a week, club together, and give the money to one of them to support her in her business. They are all married and sell cosmetics. Their businesses enable them to provide for themselves, but also to support their husband in covering the family's daily expenses. The group's leader, who is raising her hand in the photograph, is the mother of two children. She opened a tiny shop in front of her home, where she has her products on display. In order to bolster their working capital, the members of the group are seeking a loan of XOF 250'000, in order to purchase five boxes of ribbons and poplins. They ambition to strengthen their businesses.

loans.use: to buy five boxes of ribbons and poplins

loans.name: Dolgor

texts.en:
Dolgor is 41 years old and lives with her husband and five children. Three of the children go to the local high school and two girls go to the college in the capital city. 

Her husband makes archery targets and archery-related leather products. She has been running a retail business that sells milk, milk products and food in the local food market since 2000. 

She has already established regular customers and suppliers through her experience in this field. As Mongolians buy lots of milk products, when they are going to celebrate their biggest festival, she is planning to buy supplies in larger amounts. 

She says that "I would love to extend my business and raise my income, with a specific amount of financial help, so that I could pay the college tuition fees of the children". The total amount she is requesting is 3,500,000 MNT to purchase more dairy products at wholesale prices.

loans.use: To purchase more dairy products at wholesale prices
